title: Dishonored II (2) (AUS)
category: Video Games and Consoles - Xbox One - Games
description:
Reprise your role as a supernatural assassin in Dishonored 2 – the next chapter in the award-winning Dishonoredsaga by Arkane Studios. Play your way in a world where mysticism and industry collide. Will you choose to play as Empress Emily Kaldwin or the royal protector, Corvo Attano? Will you make your way through the game unseen, make full use of its brutal combat system, or use a blend of both? How will you combine your character's unique set of powers, weapons and gadgets to eliminate your enemies? The story responds to your choices, leading to intriguing outcomes, as you play through each of the game's hand-crafted missions.

Story:

Dishonored 2 is set 15 years after the Lord Regent has been vanquished and the dreaded Rat Plague has passed into history. An otherworldly usurper has seized Empress Emily Kaldwin's throne, leaving the fate of the Isles hanging in the balance. As Emily or Corvo, travel beyond the legendary streets of Dunwall to Karnaca, the once-dazzling coastal city that holds the keys to restoring Emily to power. Armed with the Mark of the Outsider and powerful new abilities, track down your enemies and take back what's rightfully yours.

Key Features:

The Assassins

As fully voiced characters, Emily Kaldwin and Corvo Attano now bring their own perspectives and emotional responses to the world and story. Use each character's set of powers, gadgets and uniquely-tuned weapons in creative ways as you explore the world – whether you fight your way through the city streets or sneak across the rooftops - and which enemies you decide to eliminate or spare.

Supernatural Powers

Advanced bonecharm crafting and all-new upgrade trees allow you to customize your powers in vastly different ways. Become a living shadow to silently stalk your targets, link enemies so they share a common fate, or mesmerize your foes and dominate their minds. Choose from nearly infinite combinations of violence, nonlethal combat, powers and weapons to accomplish your objectives.

Imaginative World

From the grimy, rat-infested streets of Dunwall to the lush, exotic coasts of a decaying Karnaca, immerse yourself in stylized locales created by Arkane's premiere art and narrative teams. The world is a character in its own right, rich with story, architecture and eclectic characters. It is also punctuated by signature mission locations, such as the Dust District, ravaged by dust storms and warring factions, and a madman's mansion made of shifting walls, deadly traps and clockwork soldiers.

Challenge

Customize your gameplay options and difficulty settings for an even more tailored adventure. You can make the experience more challenging (or easier) by changing myriad parameters related to stealth, movement and combat.

The Void Engine

Dishonored 2 is beautifully brought to life with the new Void Engine, a leap forward in rendering technology, built from id Tech and highly-customized by Arkane Studios. Designed to support world-class art direction and take full advantage of the powerful hardware this generation has to offer, the Void Engine allows for significant advances to all game systems, including responsive stealth and combat Artificial Intelligence, lighting and graphical rendering, impressively dense urban environments, and story presentation.

title: Oskia - Renaissance Mask
category: Beauty - Skin care - Face - Treatments & Masks - Masks
description:
Here is a wonder product that we prefer to call it, and we do not do it for no reason! Find out why!

Oskia Renaissance Mask is a peel-in-a-balm designed to increase skin cell renewal with AHA and fruit acids and boost skin radiance with MSM and prebiotics.
This luxurious, exfoliating mask, filled with OSKIA's trademark blend of beauty-boosting nutrients, leaves the skin smoother, more refined and radiant. With a fresh, aromatic scent of rose, passion fruit and chamomile - all organically certified. OSKIA Renaissance Mask works effectively to remove dead skin cells and boost cell regeneration and ATP energy without damaging or removing the outer layer of the skin. The mask is pink to begin with, after which the luxurious, unique cream changes color to white when massaged well into the skin.

All in all, it is an extraordinary product from Oskia, which has some vital ingredients that are crucial for effective skin care and skin protection. The above product is not just another mask, but actually a source of a nicer and healthier skin, which ages more slowly. You will thank yourself for investing in this unique mask.

Application:

  • Apply on dry, clean skin and let sit for 10-20 minutes depending on your skin type. Massage into the skin for a few seconds to activate the ingredients (the mask turns white).
  • Sensitive skin types should only leave the mask on for 10 minutes.
  • Add a little water to the face just before washing off the mask and massaging again. This turns the mask into a milk and activates the second phase.
  • Rinse with warm water.
  • Easy to wash off and leaves your skin with a great, clean feeling.
  • Do not allow the product to come into contact with water. Do not store in cold temperatures. Small grains may form in the product if stored in a cold, humid environment, but this does not affect the efficiency of the product.

Benefits:

  • Suitable for vegans
  • Enzyme mask for all skin types
  • Plumps and brightens the skin
  • Makes your skin younger, healthier and more beautiful
  • Makes your skin age more slowly
  • Contains vital ingredients, that are crucial for your skin
  • Winner of 11 ‘Best Mask’ awards

title: Wildlands - The Unquiet Dead (EN) (OG3067)
category: Toys - Games - Role Playing Games
description:
Within the Wildlands the word is spreading--the dead have not finished with the living. Refusing to yield to their own mortality, a nightmarish gang of undead miscreants have taken to the battlefield, striking fear into the hearts of all who oppose them.

The Unquiet Dead introduces a new faction to Martin Wallace's Wildlands with the unique mechanic of common activation. Undead characters share activation symbols, giving players an aggressive new play style. The faction pack also includes an option for players to use the undead as non-player characters, with more undead flooding the board as battle rages.

Please note that this expansion requires a copy of Wildlands.

title: Nuxe - Huile Prodigieuse Golden Shimmer Face and Body Oil 50 ml
category: Beauty - Skin care - Face - Oils & Serums
description:
Nuxe Huile Prodigieuse Multi-Purpose Golden Shimmer is Dry Oil for face, body and hair. 98.1% of the ingredients in this Shimmering Dry Oil are of natural origin, it is a unique combination of 30% Precious Plant Oils and Vitamin E to nourish, repair and soften your face, body and hair in a single step. For all skin types and ages.

Application:

  • Apply to face, top of your day cream
  • Inflict the places you want highlighted, eg. throat, neck, shoulder and arms
  • Apply it on your less visible stretch marks
  • Mix a little bit with your foundation and will give a beautiful glow on the face
  • Apply to hair, cover your hair with a towel, let it sit for 20 minutes and wash it then out

Benefits:

  • Contains essential oils and vitamin E
  • Provides a supple and smooth skin
  • Leaves your hair silky
  • Healing power of less visible stretch marks
  • Moisturizes, nourishes and repairs
  • Without parabens
  • Contains multi reflective particles
  • Provides a beautiful and nice golden glow

    Nuxe is the combination of two words: nature and luxe!

    In 1989 Aliza Jabés took over the french Laboratoire Nuxe. Until then it was just another quaint beauty lab. But Jabés, a new mom and businesswoman, was determined to use her knowledge of aromatherapy and phytotherapy to create a multifunctional product for busy women like herself. The result was Huile Prodigieuse Dry Oil, Nuxe's first cult product.

    The line is now a staple in luxury pharmacies across the world, and their skin and body formulas are known for their gorgeous feel and stellar performance. The philosophy behind Nuxe products is to be natural and long lasting, with a dose of sensuality. That's why Nuxe skips mineral oils, parabens, or animal substances and opts for natural actives that have been tried and tested in their laboratories. The line looks and feels luscious, too.

title: Sol de Janeiro - Bom Dia Bright Cream 240 ml
category: Beauty - Bath and body - Moisturizers - Creams
description:
Give your skin a daily boost of moisture with this wonderful body cream.

Bom Dia Bright Cream gives you silky soft skin with a healthy glow all the way down to the toes. The cream is enriched with fruit AHAs that gently exfoliate, so that uneven skin turns into a radiant, refreshed skin. It gives you daily care and helps to even out skin tone as well as minimize the appearance of dark spots with vitamin C. The cream also helps to support the production of collagen and elastin as well as speed up cell turnover, which helps keep the pores clear and combats ingrown hairs with natural AHAs and BHAs.

Application:

  • Use daily or as needed

  • For ingrown hairs due to hair removal and on uneven areas: use 2 times a day

Advantage:

  • Wonderful body cream from Sol de Janeiro

  • Daily boost of moisture

  • Gives you silky soft skin

  • Exfoliates gently

  • Smoothes the skin tone

  • Minimizes dark spots

  • Fights ingrown hairs

title: IdHAIR - Extreme Titanium 100 ml
category: Beauty - Hair care - Stylings products - Pomades and waxes
description:
IdHAIR's Extreme Titanium is the strongest hair wax from IdHAIR. The wax is free of parabenes,  and gives the hair a slightly dusty look. The wax is 100% water-soluble, thus can be washed out easily without leaving any styling residue. With IdHAIR Extreme Titanium, you can restyle your hair over and over again throughout the day. IdHAIR Extreme Titanium gives extreme hold to short hair. IdHAIR Extreme Titanium gives a clear separation.

Application

  • Rub a small amount between palms, and work through dry hair
  • Style as desired

Benefits

  • Parabene free
  • Easy to rinse out 
  • 100% water soluble 
  • Discreet scent
  • Strong hold and neutral shine

Id Hair

IdHAIR was founded in 1986 and has grown rapidly and has become a reputable, dynamic and foresighted company. IdHAIR is currently the fastest growing brand in Europe with the best selling waxes in the Scandinavia and UK market. IdHAIR’s goal is to offer the best hair products on the market. IdHAIR wax was the first water-soluble wax on the Danish market.

title: Legend of Mana (Import)
category: Video Games and Consoles - Nintendo Switch - Games
description:
The classic action RPG that you’ve loved in the 90s because of its colorful hand-drawn graphics, soundtracks and gameplay is remastered!

The game includes updated graphics and game mechanics never before seen in previous Mana titles, like the Land Creation System and the mini-game ”Ring Ring Land”. Get ready to embark on a magical adventure in finding the Mana Tree!

Upon your journey, you are bound to find special artifacts, which can be used to fill the map that will bring the towns and dungeons to life and help you advance in the story.

Also, let’s not forget about the lively and colorful cast of the game. Help them accomplished various quests in the enormous world of Fa’Diel.

Plus, not only the visuals and system enhancements have been revamped but as well as the music. The original music was rearranged to befit the other enhancements made in the classic game. Players now have the option to alternate between the new and original soundtrack.

Get ready to relive the magic of the timeless classic in High Definition with new and updated features in Legend of Mana Remastered.

title: Sonic the Hedgehog (Import)
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 3 - Games
description:
In his first adventure set in the human world, Sonic meets a beautiful princess named Elise, whom he quickly befriends, but Princess Elise is abducted by none other than the calculating Dr. Eggman who is working under dark and sinister motives
In order to restore safety and serenity, Sonic must maneuver his way through a series of adventures and challenges where he will encounter and interact with a bevy of allies and enemies, and ultimately go head to head against the menacing doctor
Speed Redefined. Utilizing next-gen technologies, light bloom, and environmental motion-blur effects, Sonic's breakneck speed and dazzling world come to life.
The dynamic environments have been specifically created to promote Sonic's sense of speed while delivering a great sense of scale.
Two different types of stages. Town stages where Sonic will be able explore vast environments and play various sub-missions, and Action stages where Sonic's blistering speed will be utilized in full effect.

title: Little Tikes - Cozy Coupe Princess (401239)
category: Toys - Baby and Toddler Toys - Ride-ons
description:
Cozy couple in princess theme. High quality toy for indoor and outdoor use. This charming little girl's version of the classic kid-powered car features colors and styling specially designed to please every little princess - now with an updated look to celebrate the Cozy Coupe's 30th anniversary!

New features include removable floor and handle on back for parent-controlled push rides.

Features:

  • Includes a high seat back and storage in the rear, plus a driver's door that opens and closes.
  • Easy-to-grip steering wheel has a fun working horn -- beep, beep!
  • Opening door, with latch
  • Parent grab handle in roof,
  • Removable floorboard for toddlers.
  • Max. weight per child 23kg


PLEASE NOTE: Trailer sold separately.

title: Batman: Arkham VR (#)
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 4 - Games
description:
Batman: Arkham VR immerses you in the Dark Knight's Universe and redefines what it means to be the Batman. Experience Gotham City through the eyes of the World's Greatest Detective in an all new Arkham mystery

FEATURES:

Batman: Arkham VR immerses you in the Dark Knight's Universe and redefines what it means to be the Batman.
Experience Gotham City through the eyes of the World's Greatest Detective in an all new Arkham mystery.
PlayStation VR required to play this game

title: Kingdom Hearts: The Story So Far
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 4 - Games
description:
In KINGDOM HEARTS - The Story So Far -, Keyblade wielders can relive the magical adventures of Sora, Donald Duck, Goofy and friends as they attempt to stop the Heartless invasion that threatens their universe. Fans will travel to iconic Disney worlds and join forces with beloved Disney and FINAL FANTASY® characters in order to fight back against the threat of darkness and bring back light to all worlds.

The compilation includes the following games:

  • KINGDOM HEARTS HD 1.5+2.5 ReMIX
  • KINGDOM HEARTS FINAL MIX
  • KINGDOM HEARTS Re:Chain of Memories
  • KINGDOM HEARTS 358/2 Days (HD Remastered cinematics)
  • KINGDOM HEARTS II FINAL MIX
  • KINGDOM HEARTS Birth by Sleep Final MIX
  • KINGDOM HEARTS Re:coded (HD Remastered cinematics)
  • KINGDOM HEARTS HD 2.8 FINAL CHAPTER PROLOGUE
  • KINGDOM HEARTS Dream Drop Distance HD
  • KINGDOM HEARTS 0.2 Birth by Sleep –A fragmentary passage–
  • KINGDOM HEARTS χ Back Cover (movie)

title: The Nioh Collection (Import)
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 5 - Games
description:
In this expansive collection, journey through Sengoku-era Japan to face nightmarish foes and legendary warriors in blisteringly fast hardcore combat. Master the way of the samurai in Nioh, then unleash your inner darkness in Nioh 2 - each expertly remastered and enhanced for PS5.

  • Discover the complete Nioh saga with all six major expansions included.
  • Battle the yokai threat at a stunning 120fps with ultra-fast load times.

title: The Nioh Collection (Nordic)
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 5 - Games
description:
In this expansive collection, journey through Sengoku-era Japan to face nightmarish foes and legendary warriors in blisteringly fast hardcore combat. Master the way of the samurai in Nioh, then unleash your inner darkness in Nioh 2 - each expertly remastered and enhanced for PS5.

  • Discover the complete Nioh saga with all six major expansions included.
  • Battle the yokai threat at a stunning 120fps with ultra-fast load times.

title: 24 Bottles - Travel Tumbler 0,35 L - Marrakech (24B636)
category: Home and Kitchen - Kitchen and dining - Travel & To-Go Drinkware - Travel Insulated Tumblers
description:
Leakproof, insulated and compact. Travel Tumbler lets you enjoy your hot coffee or your fresh smoothie while on the run thanks to its native, 100% leakproof, flip-top lid. The Sip & Go Lid is specially designed to follow your everyday life, so you don’t have to worry when you’re on the go.

Much more than hot coffee and fresh smoothies.

Versatile and smart, Travel Tumbler lets you sip your coffee, latte or chocolate during a cold, winter day, keeping it hot for up to 6 hours. You can also refresh yourself through a warm, summer day by sipping your smoothie, iced tea, milkshake, fruit juice, lemonade or cocktail, enjoying it cold for up to 24 hours.

Features:

  • Keeps liquids cold up to 24h and hot up to 12h
  • 8/8 food grade stainless steel
  • 100% BPA free, phthalates free, toxins free
  • Sport&Go Lid 100% leakproof with long straw
  • Does not retain nor impart any flavour
  • Sweat-free, does not condensate
  • Mouth width 7.2 cm: comfortable filling & cleaning
  • Suitable for any kind of drinks
  • Stone Finish: highly chip-resistant & sandy matte
  • Hand wash recommended
  • Volume: 350 ml / 0,35 L
  • Material:Stainless steel
  • Diameter:  8,0 cm
  • H 12,5 cm 
  • Weight:  225 g

title: Babytrold - OS2 Twin Pushchair - Black
category: Baby and Children - Pushchairs, Prams & Accessories - Pushchairs & Prams - Pushchairs
description:
Lovely Twin or sibling Stroller from Babytrold, in a handy model that fills very little collapsed. The Pushchair has swivel front wheels that make the stroller easy to maneuver, making it useful for both shopping and walking. Backrests and footrests can be individually regulated so that each child can have optimal sitting comfort at the same time.

Includes integrated 5-point harness, front brace and basket. The wheels are point-free.

Product details:

  • Dimensions collapsed: L93 cm., W 78 cm., H33 cm. 
  • Dimensions: L 91 cm., W 78 cm. H105 cm. 
  • Lying dimension: 73 cm. 
  • Handle height: 105 cm. 
  • Recommended age: 6 months to 3 yers
  • Weight pr. seat: 15 kg
  • The pushchair meets all the requirements of EU Standard EN 1888: 2012

Babytrold

Babytrold is a danish family company, that started develop prams back in 1994. Babytrold keeps developing new products and improves the exciting as well. There product line keeps growing and the past years it has grown with a lot of pram models and baby products. Babytrold knows how important it is to new parents to get the best products for there baby, and that is why Babytrold strives to make the best products for your baby.

Transport is a lot more than getting from A to B. When it comes to a car you have a lot of thought regarding security, economy, comfort and design. The same things should be important when you buy a new pram.

The European security demands to a pram are strict, but not all lives up to these important demands. That's why it is important to buy a pram, that meets the European standard EN:1888:2012, which all Babytrold prams is tested and approved by. There is a lot of thoughts in both practical and security details in the development of the wagons. The beautiful and comfortable design is just a pleasing contribution to your daily stroll.

title: Triangle Strategy
category: Video Games and Consoles - Nintendo Switch - Games
description:
Three nations battle for control of the dwindling resources of salt and iron in Square Enix’s newest HD-2D adventure

Command a group of warriors as Serenoa, heir of House Wolffort, in a tangled plot where your decisions make all the difference. Key choices you make will bolster one of three convictions&mdashUtility, Morality, Liberty&mdashwhich together make up Serenoa’s world view and influence how the story will unfold. When faced with truly momentous decisions, multiple characters will weigh in by casting their votes on the Scales of Conviction. In these moments, the allies and decisions you make can determine the fate of whole nations and the continent of Norzelia itself.

Control multi-tiered battlefields to strategically secure victory

Finding the best location in turn-based battles can tip the tide of combat in your favor. Position units on higher ground to take control of the battlefield and gain the advantage with increased range. You can also flank enemies on both sides, then strike from behind for a powerful follow-up attack. Elemental chain reactions are also an important part of combat. For example, use fire to melt icy terrain, then use lightning to electrocute it. Push the enemy into the electrified water to see sparks fly in stunning HD-2D visuals!

Sylvanian Families let children craft their own stories, and helps them develop social skills and emotional intelligence through imaginative play. Sylvania is a sanctuary where everyone can be part of the family, letting children learn about relationships, including being kind to each other.

category: Toys - Dolls and Dollhouses - Dollshouse & Accessories - Dolls' House Accessories

title: LEGO Friends - Heartlake City Movie Theater (41448)
category: Toys - Building and Construction Toys - Building Sets
description:
Treat kids to a red-carpet play experience as they imagine attending a movie premier at the LEGO® Friends Heartlake City Movie Theater (41448).

This gift for kids features an art deco-style cinema packed with authentic details, such as a VIP area, popcorn kiosk and slushy cups. It comes complete with a starlet, ready to sign autographs for adoring fans. Everything in a toy a kid needs to transport them to a glamorous night at the movies.

In the director's chair
The model is hinged so kids can open it out to reveal a VIP screening room with exclusive seats for 5 of their most fabulous friends. The characters can ‘view’ the film on the screen, but this also flips to accommodate a cell phone, so kids can play director by showing their very own movies.

Realistic role-play adventures
LEGO Heartlake City birthday gifts for kids come packed with real-world details and relatable characters. They encourage kids to conjure up a creative world of role-play fun, alone or with their friends and family.

  • Dazzle a movie-mad youngster with LEGO® Friends Heartlake City Movie Theater (41448). It’s premier night at this vintage-style cinema, with a red carpet and a glamorous LEGO Friends movie star!

  • This hinged toy playset features a ticket desk and red-carpet area on one side and opens out to form a screening room, restroom and popcorn kiosk. Includes LEGO® Friends Andrea and 2 other mini-dolls.

  • Kids can role-play superfan Andrea or movie star Amelia, or they can pretend to sell tickets andpopcorn. Movie-mad kids can imagine they’re a VIP watching the premier or operate the toy projector.

  • The Heartlake City cinema lets kids screen their own movie creations for the mini-dolls by resting a cell phone against the screen, which also flips to support a tablet.

  • As with all LEGO® Friends sets, this model is packed with cool accessories to make the action come alive – this set includes tickets, paper and pen, popcorn, slushy cups and cash bills.

  • Put a smile on the face of movie-mad kids aged 7+ with a birthday, Christmas or special-occasion gift of this interactive Heartlake City movie theater toy.

  • Measuring over 6.5 in. (17 cm) high, 10 in. (27 cm) wide and 7 in. (19 cm) deep, this kids’ movie toy makes a head-turning centerpiece that will take pride of place in any bedroom.

  • LEGO® Friends toys come with relatable characters and are packed with adorable toy accessories to set imaginations soaring.

  • All new LEGO® Friends sets meet stringent industry standards toensure they are compatible, and connect and pull apart consistently every time – it’s been that way since 1958.

  • Popular LEGO® toys are tested to the max to make sure they meet stringent global safety and quality standards.

title: X-shot - Watergun Fast Fill Large (60149)
category: Toys - Outdoor Toys - Water Pistols
description: The Fast-Fill X-Shot large watergun allows you to refill your blaster in 2 seconds and get back to the water blasting action long before your opponents. It is the fastest filling blaster ever created! You are ready and equiped to win The water battle

title: Filibabba - Led Whale - Christian (FI-NL001)
category: Toys - Baby and Toddler Toys - Soothing Sound and Light Toys
description:
Rechargeable LED whale via USB, which means it does not need batteries. The LED whale Christian brings calm colors and shines beautifully in the little children's room. Give Christian a loving flap and he will shine up the room in different colors.

  • Color: White with changing colors
  • Material: Silicone

title: Barbie - Medical Vehicle (FRM19)
category: Toys - Dolls and Dollhouses - Fashion Dolls & Accessories - Vehicles
description:
Barbie® doll comes to the rescue with her care clinic vehicle -- just press the button to sound the siren! Lift the lever at the back of the colorful vehicle to instantly transform it into a care clinic. Barbie® doll can greet her patients at the check-in stand that flips up in the center of the clinic. On the left, a yellow couch can be pulled down to reveal a waiting room with a fish tank. Pull down the fish tank to reveal a gift shop, where you can pick get-well gifts like a teddy bear or heart-shaped balloon! On the right, an exam room is fully equipped for medical emergencies and check-ups. The pink patient bed can be adjusted for comfort and also doubles as storage. Simply pull down the lever of the vision chart to reveal an x-ray machine. The set comes with accessories for Barbie® doll to shine in any emergency situation, including a medical bag, stethoscope, arm casts, leg casts, blood pressure machine, and more! All of the items can be easily folded back into the vehicle so that Barbie® doll can rush to her next rescue with portability and ease! Includes transforming vehicle playset with 15+ pieces Barbie® doll not included.

  • Turn on the ambulance siren and lights with the push of a button. Then lift the lever in back to reveal the clinic, with check-in station, waiting room, and exam room.
  • Flip down the television to open the gift shop &mdash and slide the lever on the x-ray machine to transform it into a vision chart.
  • Barbie® doll (not included) can treat patients using the stethoscope, thermometer, blood pressure cuff, and other diagnostic equipment.
  • All 20+ pieces fit back into the vehicle, so you can race to the next rescue with portability and ease.

title: Life is Strange: True Colors
category: Video Games and Consoles - Nintendo Switch - Games
description:
Embark on an emotionally charged, story-driven adventure where a unique power is the key to solving a nerve-wracking mystery.

Alex Chen has long suppressed her 'curse': the supernatural ability to experience, absorb and manipulate the strong emotions of others, which she sees as blazing, colored auras. 

When her brother dies in a so-called accident, Alex must embrace her volatile power to find the truth – and uncover the dark secrets buried by a small town.

But remember: the truth can hurt.

Life Is Strange: True Colors marks a bold new era in the award-winning Life is Strange series.

title: Disney Princess - Maximus - 80 CM (41589-4L-PKR1)
category: Toys - Dolls and Dollhouses - Fashion Dolls & Accessories - Horses
description:
Have the best playdate ever with Disney Maximus, Rapunzel’s trusted steed! Giddy up and get ready for exciting adventures with playdate Maximus when you sit on his back and pull on his reins as he responds by moving his head and makes realistic horse sounds. Pull twice and Maximus will make a “trotting” sound. 

Offer Maximus his included apple and he can hold it in his mouth and make “chomping” sounds. Decorate his beautiful mane with the wear & share hair accessories and brush for hair play fun! he even comes with a Saddlebag for storage.
For even more fun, playdate Rapunzel can also sit on Maximus with you or by herself!

  • Maximus stands over 2-feet tall
  • Pull on his reins and Maximus will respond with motion and sounds
  • Playdate Maximus can hold his apple in his mouth
  • Decorate his hair with the wear & share accessories
  • Playdate Maximus can support up to 70lbs

title: Pokemon - Battle Figure 6 Pack (PKW2470)
category: Toys - Figures - Gaming Figures
description:

A dry shampoo that can refresh you and your hair at any time - it takes a maximum of 20-30 seconds! Use it when you do not have time to wash your hair.

The dry shampoo has a fresh and natural scent, which has the ability to remove the tiring smell of dirty hair. You can always bring this dry shampoo wherever you are, due to its practical size. That way, you can always ensure yourself some fresh and gorgeous hair.

Application:

Advantage:

title: Dr. Hauschka - Revitalising Mask 30 ml
category: Beauty - Skin care - Face - Treatments & Masks - Masks
description:
This Revitalizing Mask from Dr. Hauschka, is a complementary, deep-acting facial cleanser for unclean and sunbathing skin with large pores. It contains the medicinal plants quince, yellow round bell and chamomile, which stimulates the natural rhythm of the skin and helps it keep on moisture. In addition, it has the nutritious plant extracts from jojoba, apricot kernels and wheat germ, making the mask cleanse on the skin, giving it a healthy radiation. Your skin will feel stretched and get a uniform look using this facial cleanser. With this little plejeritual you give yourself and your skin some wonderful moments of well-being, and your skin gets a beautiful complexion and healthy glow.

Application:

  • Apply to clean and dry skin
  • Let it work for up to 20 minutes
  • Wash thoroughly with warm water
  • Used 1-2 times a week

Benefits:

  • Revitalising Mask from Dr. Hauschka
  • Additional facial cleansing for your normal facial cleansing
  • Mask form
  • Seems be tightening
  • Provides a uniform skin tone
  • Refining the skin
  • Adjusts moisture balance
  • Free of parabens
  • Good for unclean and sunny skin

Dr. Hauschka

Dr. Hauschka is an environmentally certified brand that produces environmentally friendly, organic and biodynamic skin products. Robert Hauschka was a young chemist who developed natural medical products through unique thinking and manufacturing methods.

Stud the rhythms ... the rhythm carries life. Dr. Hauschka developed, based on this sentence, a completely new and revolutionary method for improving his natural medical products. The rhythm is found in nature, in man and in the universe. Considering and following the various rhythms of production, Dr. Hauschka achieved very good results. He spent several years thinking about developing great skin care products.

This became a reality when he entered into cooperation with the Swedish cosmetologist, Elisabeth Sigmund. Among other things, the products were developed to follow the skin's rhythm and changeable condition. They were produced without chemical-synthetic emulsifiers and with beautiful fragrances from essential oils. In 1999, they were able to present their new complete makeup series that not only adorns but also carries the face.

The products are also being developed today as naturally as possible. Dr. Hauschka's philosophy is that when you take something, you also give something back - this applies in all contexts of life. WALA therefore cultivates many of their herbs and medicines themselves. This is done ecologically and biodynamically without chemical insects and pesticides.

Dr. Hauschka's products are not manufactured for a particular skin type, but to a given skin condition. The skin changes in a 28-day cycle. Therefore, it is important that, for example, face cream follows this rhythm. In addition, makeup from Dr. Also shed skin while wearing. Dr. Hauschka's products seduce the discerning buyer with the sensible experience of naturalness.

title: Koss - Headset Porta Pro Classic Black
category: Electronics - Audio & HiFi - Headphones & Headsets - On Ear
description:
The acclaimed Koss Porta Pro has set performance and comfort standards for personal listening worldwide. Designed for those with refined musical taste, the Porta Pro continues to be one of the most popular headphones around the world.

Known for its high-level of comfort, the Porta Pro has adjustable temporal pads to relieve pressure on the ears. Its lightweight, open-air cushions for hear-through sound keep listeners aware of their surroundings while delivering exceptional sound. The oxygen free copper voice coils and dynamic elements allow the Porta Pro to deliver rich bass and a remarkably wide frequency response. 

Whether you’re listening at home or on the go, the Koss Porta Pro delivers all the excitement of a live performance.

  • The ultra portable on-ear headphones
  • Comfort Zone setting on temporal pad for comfortable secure fit
  • The ultimate active headphones with a collapsible headband design for protective storage

  • Oxygen-free copper voice coils deliver deep bass and signal clarity

title: Pure - Highway 600 DAB/DAB+ Car Adapter
category: Electronics - Car & Vehicle Electronics - Car Electronics - Audio - Car Stereos
description:
The easiest way to enjoy DAB digital radio, Bluetooth music streaming from your mobile and hands-free calling in your car, this clever audio adapter is simple to fit and works seamlessly with your existing in-car audio system.

Specifications

  • Frequencies: Band III 174-240 MHz
  • FM transmit range: 87.6-107.9 MHz
  • Input Connectors: 2.5mm jack socket and detachable microphone

Hasbro, Play-Doh, and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro.

title: Pokemon Alpha Sapphire
category: Video Games and Consoles - Nintendo 3DS - Games
description:
Pokémon Omega Ruby and Pokémon Alpha Sapphire are a fresh take on Pokémon Ruby and Pokémon Sapphire, that launched back in 2003 and were hits on the Gameboy Advance system they were released for.

These new titles based on Ruby and Sapphire promise to take players through a dramatic story within the awesome world of Pokémon.

The game is expected to use the same engine introduced in Pokémon X & Y, which featured fully polygonal characters and Pokémon battles for the very first time in the main Pokémon series.

title: Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D
category: Video Games and Consoles - Nintendo 3DS - Games
description:
The countdown has begun! You have just three days to save the land of Termina from destruction by its own moon, which is being pulled out of its orbit by a mysterious evil force! Re-living the days again and again, Link must use the magical Song of Time to gather the knowledge and skills he needs to solve the mystery of Majora's Mask.

In this epic adventure, Link is bestowed with magical masks to aid him in his quest. Transform into a Deku Scrub, a Goron and a Zora, using their abilities to fly through the air, roll across the land or swim through the sea!

  • Flexible, durable road toy, 648cm length

title: Crash Bandicoot - N'Sane Trilogy Remastered V2
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 4 - Games
description:
Your favorite marsupial, Crash Bandicoot, is back! He's enhanced, entranced & ready-to-dance with the N. Sane Trilogy game collection. Now you can experience Crash Bandicoot like never before in Fur-K. Spin, jump, wump and repeat as you take on the epic challenges and adventures through the three games that started it all, Crash Bandicoot, Crash Bandicoot 2: Cortex Strikes Back and Crash Bandicoot: Warped. Relive all your favorite Crash moments in their fully-remastered HD graphical glory and get ready to put some UMPH in your WUMP!

Original 3 Games Fully Remastered:

  • 3 Full Games, 100+ Levels & 2 Playable Characters
  • Experience N. Tense Platforming, Epic Challenges & Adventures
  • Stunning New Animations & Graphics
  • NEW! Play as Coco in ALL Three Games
  • NEW! Time Trials in ALL Three Games
  • NEW! Online Leaderboards

Crash Bandicoot

Dr. Neo Cortex has a plan to take over the world, and he wants to create genetically engineered animals to do his bidding. To create his minions, Cortex kidnaps as many animals as he can Crash Bandicoot's girlfriend just happens to be one of his victims. Take control of Crash as he runs, jumps, and spins through 30 levels of intense action on three different Australian islands. Only you can help Crash save the animals, save his girlfriend, and foil Dr. Cortex's plot.

Crash Bandicoot 2: Cortex Strikes Back

The evil Dr. Neo Cortex is back…out this time to save the world? And he's asking for help from his arch nemesis, Crash Bandicoot? Is this just a conniving plan to lure Crash into Cortex's next dastardly experiment? Can Crash win again or will he join Cortex's mindless zoo? Bigger free-roaming 3-D environments, all-new animations and a whole host of colorful characters – watch as our hero Crash, ice-skates, rodeo-rides a polar bear and jet-packs through zero-gravity in the continuing adventures of Crash Bandicoot 2: Cortex Strikes Back – This time he ain't joking!

Crash Bandicoot Warped

Oh yeah…he's back…AND he's ready! It's a Whole New Time-Traveling Adventure! All new-style gameplay action – scuba dive, ride a motorcycle, a baby T-Rex, and go free-roaming airborne in a plane! Play as Coco! Gallop along the Great Wall of China on a tiger, go extreme on a jet-ski and other high-flying surprises! Prove your skills with the new Super-charge Body Slam, Super Slide, Double Jump, Death-Tornado Spin and a Laser-Guided Bazooka. All new enemies include a new Big Boss, Uka Uka, N. Tropy, a menacing Dingodile and of course, the return of some favorites like N. Gin and Tiny. More Action. More Fun. More Puzzles and Secret Levels. And you didn't think it could get any better!

title: PAW Patrol The Movie Adventure City Calls
category: Video Games and Consoles - Xbox One - Games
description:
A big city means a bigger adventure! When Ryder and the PAW Patrol learn that Mayor Humdinger has taken over a buzzing metropolis, they must race into action to save Adventure City from his selfish scheming. The pups need YOU to join Team PAWsome! So, Adventure City here we come! Be your favorite pups including Chase, Skye, Marshall, and new streetwise city girl, Liberty – and use their unique abilities in high-adrenaline rescue missions. Use next-level gadgets and vehicles to explore all-new locations from PAW Patrol: The Movie. And have fun with minigames like Pup Pup Boogie, Run-ners, and more. You can play solo, or in couch co-pup mode with a friend, in this fun-for-all 3D platforming adven-ture.

The PAW Patrol pups were born to be heroes – are you ready to join them on their bravest mission yet?!

Features:

  • TO ADVENTURE CITY! – Explore all-new locations from PAW Patrol: The Movie
  • BE THE PUPS – Including Chase, Marshall, Skye, and new city girl Liberty
  • MISSION PAW – Save the day in amazing rescue and bonus missions
  • COLLECT THEM ALL – Unlock reward badges for collecting all the pup treats
  • PLAY MINIGAMES – Like Pup Pup Boogie, in solo or couch co-op mode

title: Hitman: Definitive Edition
category: Video Games and Consoles - Xbox One - Games
description:
IO Interactive has crafted their PERFECT HITMAN EXPERIENCE taking the best elements from all previous games to create this modern-day masterpiece. The closest players will get to the pure Hitman fantasy, not only by becoming the ultimate professional assassin, butby enjoying the most vividly detailed locations and discovering the most innovative ways to take out yourtargets. title: Hitman III (3)
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 4 - Games
description:
Experience the dramatic conclusion of the World of Assassination trilogy with the ruthless Agent 47 in HITMAN 3.

Travel the world on a mercenary adventure as Agent 47, the ruthless professional assassin who must complete the most important contracts of his career.

You will experience a freedom like never before, and see how the world around you reacts to the events that you yourself cause. Experience the Danish gaming company, IO Interactive's award-winning Glacier technology, which means that Hitman 3 takes place in an empathetic world that offers freedom of play without equal.

Hitman 3 features:

  • Campaign mode - Campaign mode takes you on a worldwide adventure in sparkling sandbox worlds, giving you the dramatic conclusion of the World of Assassination trilogy

  • Elusive Targets - Elusive Targets is the ultimate Hitman challenge, and is designed to give you an exciting and adrenaline-pumping experience. You need to track down unique targets, almost without the help of HUD or Instinct, and find a way to eliminate them on the go.

  • Escalations - Test your own skills and push yourself to your limits in this game mode, adding new elements to each level of the contract. Additional security cameras, limited disguises and other challenges are thrown your way.

  • Contracts Mode - choose your own goals and choose how to eliminate them and then execute it. Once you've done it yourself, you can challenge your friends and compete for the best score.

title: Hitman 2
category: Video Games and Consoles - Xbox One - Games
genre: Action, Adventure, Stealth, Third Person Shooter
description:
Travel the globe and track your targets across exotic sandbox locations in HITMAN 2. From sun-drenched streets to dark and dangerous rainforests, nowhere is safe from the world's most creative assassin, Agent 47.

Prepare to experience the ultimate spy thriller story your mission is to eliminate the elusive Shadow Client and unravel his militia, but when 47 learns his target's true identity and the truth about his past, it changes everything.

HITMAN 2 introduces new ways to play, new game modes and new features, including the new Sniper Assassin mode with franchise first co-op play.

title: AEROZ - MG-1100 Muscle Massage Gun
category: Health and Personal Care - Wellness - Electric Massagers - Electric Handheld Massagers
description:
Sore muscles after training, but no masseur within reach? Then this muscle massage gun is guaranteed to be just the thing for you.

With this muscle massage gun, you relieve sore muscles and loosen up the areas where you often experience tension or pain. To achieve the best effect, the massage gun has 6 different intensity modes, which can be adapted to your needs and your muscles. Do you have pain in the exact spot on your back that you normally cannot reach? That is not a problem with the massage gun, which contains 4 different kinds of accessories, which make it easy to hit the muscles that are difficult to reach. A relieving and restorative tool that will undoubtedly benefit your muscles and therefore also your training!

Product info:

  • Muscle massage gun (MG-1100) from AEROZ
  • 6 different intensity modes
  • 4 different kinds of accessories
  • The device is rechargeable, which makes it possible to take it with you on the go
  • 1100 - 3300 pulsations per. minute
  • Weight: 840 grams
  • Dimensions: 17 x 22 x 6.5 cm
  • Battery: 7.4V - 2000 mAh (built-in rechargeable lithium batterypack)
  • USB cable 100 cm included - charge with USB 5V charger  (charger not included)

Black LCD display with illuminated numbers makes it easy to read the numbers.

  • With Bluetooth® low energy technology - keep track of your measurements

title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
category: Video Games and Consoles - Nintendo Switch - Games
description:
If the hustle and bustle of modern life’s got you down, Tom Nook has a new business venture up his sleeve that he knows you’ll adore: the Nook Inc. Deserted Island Getaway Package! Sure, you’ve crossed paths with colorful characters near and far. Had a grand time as one of the city folk. May’ve even turned over a new leaf and dedicated yourself to public service! But deep down, isn’t there a part of you that longs for…freedom? Then perhaps a long walk on the beach of a deserted island, where a rich wealth of untouched nature awaits, is just what the doctor ordered!

Peaceful creativity and charm await as you roll up your sleeves and make your new life whatever you want it to be. Collect resources and craft everything from creature comforts to handy tools. Embrace your green thumb as you interact with flowers and trees in new ways. Set up a homestead where the rules of what goes indoors and out no longer apply. Make friends with new arrivals, enjoy the seasons, pole-vault across rivers as you explore, and more!

Features

  • Customize your character and home, and decorate the landscape (with furniture, if you like!), as you create your very own island paradise.
  • Experience a robust new crafting system—collect materials to construct everything from furniture to tools!
  • Enjoy a variety of relaxing activities like gardening, fishing, decorating, interacting with charming NPCs, and more, as classic Animal Crossing experiences come to life in fun new ways within the deserted-island setting.

title: Elizabeth Arden - Eight Hour Intensive Lip Repair Balm
category: Beauty - Skin care - Lip care - Balms & Moisturizers
description:
Eight Hour Lip Repair Balm is incredibly effective to rebuild sensitive skin of the lips, which have trouble retaining moisture. The Lip balm will immediately be able to soothe and strengthen the lips with its rich full formula that provides long-lasting moisture. The formula also contributes to that the lips will achieve a healthier look and be more beautiful than ever. Elizabeth Arden - Eight Hour Lip Rebuild balm comes in a beautiful bottle with a twist-off cap. The Lip balm is also with the scent of refreshing Eucalyptus-based notes. Super discretionary award-winning product from Elizabeth Arden, when the lips deserves the best care.


Features:

  • Lip balm
  • Award winning product
  • Resumes Buildings moisture for sensitive lips
  • Richfull formula for long-lasting moisture
  • Healthier and more beautiful lip look
  • Durability 8 hours
  • Notes of refreshing Eucalyptus
  • Clinically tested by dermatologist
  • Allergy tested


Elizabeth Arden, (1878-1966) was a Canadian professional woman who pioneered in skin care and cosmetics. She established the company Elizabeth Arden that later became a multi-national business. Elizabeth Arden was a nurse and later in her life, she got an education in skin care and beauty. In 1910 she was self-contained with her own clinic on 5th Avenue in New York. Characteristic of the clinic was the red door, which since has been used at Elizabeth Arden salons worldwide. The door and the street name of her first salon has also given names to fragrances as Red Door and 5th Avenue.

title: Rocksmith Real Tone Cable for PC, PS3 & Xbox 360
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 3 - Accessories - PlayStation 3 Cables
description: Rocksmith is the first and only video game where players can plug any real guitar with a standard quarter-inch input jack into an Xbox 360 or PlayStation 3, and play through an in-depth library of music including everything from the latest hits to classic rock. The use of a second Rocksmith Real Tone Cable allows for simultaneous split-screen cooperative play. The 11.25 feet cable will also allow players to plug in and record their instrument directly into their computer at 48KHz. The unique cable design ensures quick release of the guitar from the gaming console or computer to protect the player's gear.

title: Trybike - CoConut Helmet, Vintage Red (S)
category: Toys - Riding Toys - Safety Helmet and equipment - Kids' Safety Helmets
description:
The Trybike CoConut retro helmet is robust, handy and light. The hard outer shell gives the helmet, in contrast to foam helmets, a longer life and better protection for children. 

CoConut's retro helmets that are light, safe and practical and come in three sizes Extra small, small and medium suitable for children between the ages of two and 12. All Trybike helmets have adjustable garden straps and a built-in screw strap in the neck, so they can be fully adjusted. The helmets are made of quality ABS plastic and have foam padding to ensure a better main comfort. 

Sizes:

Extra Small (XS) : 44 - 51 centimeter

Small (S) : 46 - 53 centimeter

Medium (M) : 52 - 58 centimeter.

title: Nintendo Switch Sports
category: Video Games and Consoles - Nintendo Switch - Games
description:
Get moving with Soccer, Volleyball, Bowling, Tennis, Badminton, and Chambara (swordplay) using Joy-Con&trade controllers!

Controls are intuitive, so you can hit the court (or lanes, or field, or arena) and get started. With controlled motions you can curve your bowling ball, add spin to a tennis shot, or even use a Joy-Con with the included Leg Strap accessory to kick the ball in a Soccer Shoot-Out. Family and friends can join in on the fun on the same system* or online**. Plus a seventh sport is planned to be added via a free update this fall get ready to Golf!

title: LEGO City: Undercover
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 4 - Games
description:
Lego City: Undercover

Spring into action as a super cop and bring the crooks of LEGO CITY to justice! LEGO CITY Undercover on Wii U offers all the classic gameplay, awesome action and unique humour players have come to expect from LEGO video games – and a whole lot more too. This action title combines platforming, puzzles, exploration, combat, HD visuals and an original story with plenty of laughs. Featuring heaps of thrilling missions, over 100 unlockable vehicles and unlockable characters too, LEGO CITY sure is a busy place to hang out! As legendary police officer Chase McCain – an expert in disguises who's also a skilled free-runner – you'll go undercover on the trail of escaped criminal Rex Fury. Use different outfits and a variety of skills to hunt down that jailbird and put him back in the slammer!

As legendary police officer Chase McCain – an expert in disguises who's also a skilled free-runner – you'll go undercover on the trail of escaped criminal Rex Fury. Use different outfits and a variety of skills to hunt down that jailbird and put him back in the slammer!

In this urban adventure you're not just locked down with levels or handcuffed to the hub – the city is a massive open world for you to explore. Enjoy true freedom as you explore the seamless, high-definition grandeur of bright lights, LEGO CITY.

Chase can step into the shoes of a Miner, Construction Worker, Robber, Fireman, Farmer and more. As a Miner, Chase can smash boulders and use dynamite – sure to be an explosive experience!

Lost in the city? No chance! With a handy bird's-eye view of the area shown on the Wii U GamePad's touch screen it's easy to get your bearings. The GamePad acts as your police Communicator, scanner, map and much more.

But that's not all, you can also unlock hundreds of the inhabitants of LEGO CITY as playable characters too. LEGO studs are the currency of this brick-based burg, and they're everywhere: piled in corners, lined along rooftops, even trailed up walls!

Get your minifigure mitts on more than 100 unlockable vehicles (including cars, trucks, speedboats and helicopters) and make your way about town in something a bit more 'your speed'.

title: Just Dance 2022
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 4 - Games
description:
Just Dance® 2022, the ultimate dance game, is back with new universes and 40 hot new tracks from chart-topping hits like Believer by Imagine Dragons, Level Up by Ciara, and more!

Looking for the perfect game to dance to the latest hits and share some fun with friends and family? Just Dance 2022 is for you!

  • Exercise while having fun and start your own your routine with Sweat mode.
  • Team up with your friends and rule the dance floor in Co-op mode.
  • Engage the little ones with eight kid-friendly songs and choreographies with Kids mode.

Join more than 138 million players around the world and dance it out!

title: Air Hogs - Demo Duke (6046481)
category: Toys - Cars, trains and vehicles - Play Vehicles - Trucks
description:
Duke, the truck that loves to crash! Demo Duke is easy for kids to use. Line him up for a powerful crash, then push the throttle and let him rip! When he crashes into walls and other objects, he gets more visibly damaged with each smash. When he’s fully crashed, simply fix him with a push of the repair button and Demo Duke will automatically transform back into perfect shape, ready to crash again and again! Demo Duke’s huge personality comes alive with over 100 interactive sounds and phrases, and has a Mohawk your child can touch to hear funny sounds! Demo Duke is safety tested, has durable construction, and a soft bumper so he can crash into anything without damaging your home. Crash, fix, and transform again and again with Demo Duke!

3+ years

category: Home and Kitchen - Lighting - Lightchains
description:
Indoor LED strip with color change from Ledvance of 3 meters.

Decorate your home with elegant discreet lighting from an LED strip.
Can be used anywhere from general lighting of a room or used to highlight details in your home.

By connecting the band to a bluetooth signal, you can adjust the band's brightness, light color or turn it on / off directly from your smartphone.
Choose between DKK 16 million colors or switch between cold / warm white light.

Comes with driver and plug. So the tape is ready to put in the socket.
The back of the strap has tape for mounting.

title: Montblanc - Explorer EDP 60 ml
category: Beauty - Perfume - Eau de Parfum
description:
Montblanc Explorer is an aroma highlighted by a bouquet of fragrant green, musky and woody scented tones that will bring a natural, comforting and sensual perfumed sensation. Examining it closer once applied you will notice a lingering quality of softer fragranced earthy, bitter and aromatic hints that hide an essence of attractive, uplifting and optimistic feelings. Based on the combination of notes Mont Blanc Explorer is classified as Woody Aromatic fragrance to the nose. The fragrance composition is a creation of Antoine Maisondieu, Olivier Pescheux, Jordi Fernandez. The emanation of flavors and scent notes for Explorer unfurl in a whiff of citrus and herbal opening top notes including bergamot, clary sage and pink pepper. The leather and woody heart center notes blend in with leather and vetiver while the deep woody and amber base notes leave an impression of cacao, patchouli, ambroxan and akigalawood.

Notes:

  • Bergamot, Pink Pepper, Clary Sage, Leather, Haitian Vetiver, Indonesian Patchouli, Cacao Pod, Akigalawood and Ambroxan

description:
The road to irresistible soft skin begins in the shower. With this shower gel cream, your skin becomes silky soft and fragrant.

Get ready to embark on a sensual experience with Sol de Janeiro's addictive, fragrant, sulphate-free shower gel cream. The moisturizing shower gel cream consists of a blend of Cupuaçu butter, coconut oil and Açai oil that nourishes and pampers your skin. It is also filled with skin-friendly fatty acids, leaving your skin soft and silky, while coconut oil moisturizes and softens the skin and Açai Oil bathes it in antioxidants. It is enriched with the irresistible Cheirosa '62 scent, and the addictive notes of pistachio and salted caramel awaken your senses and make the bath a luxurious experience.

Application:

  • Massage into wet skin

  • The product turns into rich foam

  • Rinse off

Advantage:

  • Fantastic shower gel cream from Sol de Janeiro

  • Makes your skin silky soft

  • Moisturizes in depth

  • With Cupuaçu butter, coconut oil and Açai oil

  • Sulfate free

  • Addictive scent of pistachio and salted caramel

title: Little Tikes - Ride n Rescue Cozy Coupe (401209)
category: Toys - Baby and Toddler Toys - Ride-ons
description:
Now your child can move out to all the fires in the neighborhood with this cute walking car from Little Tikes!

The walking car strengthens the child's motor skills, and engages them in imaginative and active play. They will love to come to the rescue with this cool fire truck. The horn is complimented by the car's friendly, smiling face.

Product details:

  • The walking car can be used both outside and inside.

  • Age: from 18 months - 5 years.

title: Little Tikes - Fountain Factory Water Table (401919)
category: Toys - Outdoor Toys - Sand and Water Tables
description:
This Little Tikes fountain factory water table is loaded with features and fun ways to play. Kids will improve fine motor skills, sharing skills and imagination while having a splashing good time!

A water pump fills the water tower from which water then flows to the fountains. Water can be channeled into any of the three fountains. The interchangeable pipes and fittings develop kids' science and engineering senses in a fun, hands-on way. The dynamic water table is just the right height for kids and they will play for hours. An easy-drain plug is delivered for easy clean-up.

The water table is suitable for children of 2 years and over.

  • Material: Plastic
  • Dimensions: 75 x 75 x 95 cm (L x W x H)
  • Can hold 7 gallons of water
  • With an easy-drain plug for easy clean-up
  • Easy to assemble
  • Suitable for children of 2 years and over

title: Moluk - Bilibo - Light blue
category: Toys - Motoric Play
description:
The Bilibo toy has won countless awards for design and play value. Its simplicity is deceptive and modeled after extensive study of children's play patterns. Bilibo is a completely open-ended toy that stimulates a child's imagination. It can be a helmet, sit and spin, doll cradle, train tunnel, shovel, water basin and much more. Let your imagination run wild. Nearly indestructible, suitable for indoors and outdoors.

Bilibo is Designed in Switzerland and is made of non-toxic, recyclable, high-density polyethylene.

Bilibo Key features:

  • Multi-use 'open play' toy.
  • Promotes creativity and imagination.
  • Multi-award winning toy.
  • Unbreakable.
  • Stackable.
  • Dimensions: 15 x 15 x 8 inches

Bilibo is a completely open-ended toy that stimulates a child's imagination. It can be a helmet, sit and spin, doll cradle, train tunnel, shovel, water basin and much more. Let your imagination run wild. Nearly indestructible, suitable for indoors and outdoors.

Bilibo is Designed in Switzerland and is made of non-toxic, recyclable, high-density polyethylene.

Bilibo Key features:

  • Multi-use 'open play' toy.
  • Promotes creativity and imagination.
  • Multi-award winning toy.
  • Unbreakable.
  • Stackable.
  • Dimensions: 15 x 15 x 8 inches

title: Meraki - Pure Hand Lotion 275 ml (Mkas94/309770094)
category: Beauty - Bath and body - Hands - Hand cream and lotions
description:
Hand cream is great to use every time you wash hands, to give your hands the necessary hydration. Hand cream from Meraki is mild and nourishing, without fragrance, and it is perfect for everyday use. It is developed for people with sensitive skin. It nourishes your hands by hydrating the skin without leaving a greasy feeling. Hand cream contains organic coconut oil, cocoa butter and aloe vera, all of which soften and nourish your hands.

Ingredients

Aqua, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin**, Glyceryl Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera Oil*, Glyceryl Caprylate, Trehalose, Stearic Acid, Theobroma Cacao Seed Butter*, Palmitic Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Gluconate, Citric Acid, Tocopherol. *Ingredients from organic farming. **Made using organic ingredients. 99.6% natural origin of total. 27.3% of the total ingredients are from organic farming.

Useful information about Meraki Pure Hand Lotion

  • Size: 275 ml 
  • Certified organic
  • Mild lotion
  • No fragrance
  • Does not leave a greasy film
  • Suitable for sensitive skin
  • Use after washing hands

House Doctor.

The company is run by three playful siblings – Rikke Juhl Jensen, Gitte Juhl Capel, and Klaus Juhl Pedersen. They all share a creative gene and a belief in the fact that beautiful interiors enhance your passion for life. The family trio ran a successful industrial design business for a few years. But ideas for new products quickly started to emerge – and in 1999 House Doctor was born. House Doctor's style is provocative, personal, and informal. They believe that the time is right for mixing elements rather than trying to match them all up.

title: Tefal - Ingenio Jamie Oliver 3-piece set frypans 24/28 cm + 1 handle (L9569053)
category: Home and Kitchen - Kitchen and dining - Cookware - Skillets & Frying Pans
description:
Smart stainless-steel cookware with detachable handle: cooking like a chef made simple in one click. 

Designed by Jamie Oliver: Any gadget that helps me duck and dive in the kitchen is a winner, and this handle is like having an extra hand! You can grab a hot pan straight from the oven, have several pots on the hob at once without handles getting in the way, plus everything stacks away super-neatly. These two frying pans are brilliant for searing meat then slow-roasting in the oven, or whipping up a frittata and baking until golden and fluffy. Beautiful!

  • Detachable handle for ultimate versatility guaranteed 10 years
  • Stackable design for up to 50% space saving* and easy storage
  • Measuring marks, Titanium non-stick coating and Thermo-Spot
  • Induction compatible, and oven (<260°C) and dishwasher safe
  • 3-piece set frypans 24/28 cm + 1 handle 

Get a handle on cooking with the Jamie Oliver Ingenio induction pan range. In premium-quality, polished stainless steel with decorative brushed stainless-steel stripe, these elegant pans are ultra-durable, highly scratch resistant and easy to clean. But what really sets them apart is the patented Ingenio removable handle. Attaching easily in one click, this converts pans into oven dishes, serving dishes and even storage containers for ultimate versatility. Handle-free, these pots and pans stack inside each other for up to 50% space saving* and easy storage. Even the glass lids stack, thanks to the clever butterfly knob. 100% safe, the handle is made from robust Bakelite with a brushed stainless-steel insert. Three fixation points keep it secure**, it can carry up to 10kg*** and it's guaranteed for 10 years****. Uncoated saucepans have internal measuring marks for accurate cooking. Meanwhile, frying pans feature Tefal's ultra-durable and easy-to-clean Titanium non-stick coating, plus the iconic Thermo-Spot®. This turns solid red when the pan reaches the ideal cooking temperature to guarantee good food. You can use these pans on any hob type and in the oven up to 260°C. Leftovers? Just add the airtight lid and put the pan in the fridge. You can even reheat food in the same pan and they're dishwasher safe. Handle cooking like a pro with Jamie Oliver Ingenio by Tefal, the world leader in cookware

title: L'Oréal - Telescopic Mascara - Extra Black
category: Beauty - Makeup - Eyes - Mascaras
description:
Loreal Mascara Telescopic is a mascara there gives thick and glamorous eye lashes.It is clump-free and smudge-proof and gives your lashes a rich colour while leaving them conditioned. This mascara gives you beautiful and curly lashes for that ultra glam look.

Application:

  • Begin by applying the mascara to upper lashes, use the brush starting from the root to the tip to coat each lash.
  • Apply one or more successive coats to create the desired intensity. 
  • Open up the eye by using the tip of the brush to apply mascara to the lashes in the outer corner of the eye

Benefits:

  • The high-precision flexible multi-comb is made of supple elastomer bristles that help give a precise application
  • The flat surfaces of the multi-comb stretch the formula over your lashes
  • Clump-free and smudge-proof
  • Creates beautiful curly lashes

L'Oréal

The L'Oréal Paris Brand Division of L'Oréal Canada Inc. is a total beauty care company that combines the latest in technology with the highest in quality for the ultimate in luxury beauty. L'Oréal was founded by Eugène Schueller in 1909 and has since become the number one cosmetic group in the world. L'Oréal Paris is a truly global beauty brand with many internationally renowned products. For most, the name L'Oréal is immediately evocative of the brand's signature phrase, Because I'm Worth It. . Today, it represents the essence of the L'Oréal Paris brand as a whole, a spirit which is about helping every woman embrace her unique beauty while reinforcing her innate sense of self-worth. As the biggest beauty brand in the world, L'Oréal Paris has an unparalleled commitment to technology, research and innovation, providing groundbreaking, high-quality products for women, men, and children of all ages and ethnicities.

L'Oréal offers all types of beauty products within major beauty categories makeup, skin care and hair care. The worldwide success of legendary franchises such as Color Riche lipstick, Revitalift skin care or Men Expert skin care for men, reflect in particular L'Oréal's unique expertise within beauty products.

title: Minecraft: Starterpack (Nordic) (PSVR)
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 4 - Games
description:
Minecraft is a game about placing blocks and going on adventures. Build anything you can imagine with unlimited resources in Creative mode, or go on grand expeditions in Survival, journeying across mysterious lands and into the depths of your own infinite worlds. Will you hide from monsters or craft tools, armor and weapons to fight back? No need to go alone! Share the adventure with friends in split-screen multiplayer and online!

With constant updates and community creations, Minecraft is bigger, better and more beautiful than ever before. Explore amazing player-made maps, thrilling minigames and more! Band together with friends playing on phone, Windows 10 or console, set up your own online world with Realms*, or join one of the massive player-run servers*! There are so many ways to play!

title: Maybelline - Mascara - VEX Lash Sensational - Black
category: Beauty - Makeup - Eyes - Mascaras

Maybelline Lash Sensational Mascara is a super volumising mascara and that is incredibly easy to wash off again. The brush on mascara captures all the hair on the lashes and creates then a great effect on the eyelashes. The mascara brush is more soft and curvy, so it can easily reach the hairs on the lashes layer by layer.

Maybelline Lash Sensational Mascara is the formula to ensure that all lashes are covered with color and the brush smudge resistant prints or clumps during application. The mascara captures effectively and separates the hairs on the lasheseven the small lasches hair. The mascara will give an optimal definition and volume to your eyelashes. This mascara variant from Maybelline should be in every woman´s makeup collection.

  • Is applied from the tip towards the Vipperod
  • Repeat like a more distinctive look

Benefits:

  • Volume qualifying mascara
  • Mascara brush captures all Lashes hair
  • Separates and long lashes can be created
  • Beautiful full tilt effect
  • Colour cover securely
  • Smudge-resistant or clumps
  • Easy reach of the small lashes hair

Maybelline - Make it happen
Maybelline New York is one of the world's leading cosmetics brand. It is available in over 129 countries. Maybelline combines technologically advanced formulations with on-trend expertise and New York City edge. Maybelline New York's mission is to offer innovative, accessible, and effortless cosmetics for every woman, at all age. From a small, family-owned business founded in 1915 by Thomas Williams to the number one cosmetics company in the world. Maybelline New York takes trends from the catwalk to the sidewalk, empowering women to make a statement, explore new looks, and flaunt their own creativity and individuality. Inspired by confident, accomplished women, Maybelline gives you scientifically-advanced formulas, revolutionary textures and up-to-the-minute, trendsetting shades effortlessly, affordably, beautifully.

Maybelline offers more than 200 product and combines technologically advanced formulas with on-trend expertise to create accessible cosmetics with cool, urban edge and a spirited style. Maybelline has released several new products, including 'Eye Studio' collection for eye products, 'Fit Me' collection for foundation/facial products, and new 'Color Sensational' shades for lips.

title: YOUNGBLOOD - Mineral Rice Setting Powder - Medium
category: Beauty - Makeup - Face - Powders
description:
Mineral Rice Setting Powder from YOUNGBLOOD is a loose powder that makes your everyday life significantly better!

The above powder is free of talc and it contains a unique blend of rice and various important minerals. This combination means that it effectively absorbs and is perfectly suitable for oily skin.

In addition, you can also apply this amazing powder to bind your day cream better to your skin. You can also apply it as a primer or setting powder if you want to bind your makeup better.

The Mineral Rice Setting powder reduces fine lines, wrinkles and pores, and you even get a long-lasting result. The powder is popular among women in everyday life, who believe that the powder makes a big difference for them.

Application:

  • Use as a powder brush

  • Use as a primer for your day cream

  • Use as a setting for your makeup

Benefits:

  • Reduces pores, fine lines and wrinkles

  • Oil absorbent

  • Perfect for oily skin

  • Can be used both as a primer or setting

category: Beauty - Skin care - Eyes - Creams
description:
Eye cream that moisturizes, tightens and brightens the skin. In addition, it reduces fine lines, dark edges and swelling. The cream's unique multi-layered texture tightens and smooths signs of fatigue. The age-old smart antioxidant complex of low, moss, fern and foliage moisturizes and corrects fine lines and wrinkles. The cream's natural, skin-enhancing aescin boost the blood circulation and capillaries to reduce swelling and reduce dark edges so that the eye area is brightened. Smart Antioxidants Anti Fatigue Rescue Eye Cream from Mádara is suitable for all skin types, it is vegan and gluten free.

  • Apply 4 small drops to each eye and dab into the skin

title: Magformers - Amazing Police Rescue set, 26 pc (3069)
category: Toys - Building and Construction Toys - Magnets
description:
Click and create your own adventure with Magformers AMAZING Police and Rescue Set! Magformers are a magnetic construction toy where the possibilities are endless. 

Take off in the helicopter and spot the bad guys from the sky or put the fire out with a fire rescue truck. This 26 piece set comes 17 magnetic pieces, 1 police figure, 1 fire rescue figure, an emergency vehicle light bar and much more to keep the city safe. Great for children aged 3 and up.

Full rescue and emergency themed Magformers play set with magnetic pieces, accessories and characters!
• Makes 20 different police and rescue vehicles!
• With instructions how to make 2D to 3D geometric models!
• Builds 3D structures like buildings, as well as vehicles!
• Accessory pieces transform, so siren becomes a propeller, etc.
• Includes fireman and policeman characters!
• Contains: 17 magnetic squares, triangles and large rectangle. Plus 9 extra accessories. Makes 30 models.
• Make models by assembling magnetic and non magnetic pieces!

Each geometric shape contains magnets that never reject, so you’ll always hear the Magformers click. When playtime is over, use the magnetic power to simply stack and store the pieces.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 4 - Games
description:
Relive the story of Goku and other Z Fighters in DRAGON BALL Z: KAKAROT! Beyond the epic battles, experience life in the DRAGON BALL Z world as you fight, fish, eat, and train with Goku, Gohan, Vegeta and others. Explore the new areas and adventures as you advance through the story and form powerful bonds with other heroes from the DRAGON BALL Z universe. 

FEATURE POINTS

  • Experience the story of DRAGON BALL Z from epic events to light-hearted side quests, including never-before-seen story moments that answer some burning questions of Dragon Ball lore for the first time!
  • Play through iconic DRAGON BALL Z battles on a scale unlike any other. Fight across vast battlefields with destructible environments and experience epic boss battles that will test the limits of your combat abilities. Increase your power level and rise to the challenge!
  • Don’t just fight as Goku. Live as Goku. Fish, fly, eat, train, and battle your way through the DRAGON BALL Z sagas, making friends and building relationships with a massive cast of DRAGON BALL characters.

title: Goo Jit Zu - Dino XRay Single Pack - Series 4 - Tyro (41187)
category: Toys - Figures - Collectibles
description:
Heroes of Goo Jit Zu are back to battle in the all new Dino X-Ray Series! The Goos have returned and are ready for some bone busting action with the other pre-historic super squishy, stretchy heroes! The figures have a a new filling. Now they are Super Stretchy! But they are not just tough on the outside, they are Bad to the Bone! Squish the figure's body and see his bones through his stretchy skin! Squeeze him and see his goo filled body move and stretch. This toy Action Figure stretches up to three times its size and is more durable than ever before! Stretch and squish your Goo Jit Zu Hero and he will always come back to his original shape! Each Goo Jit Zu Dino X-Ray Action Figure has a unique Goo Filling! Check out all the unique different fillings of the Dino X-Ray figs! They're Gooey, Goopy, Scrunchy, Oozy, Squishy, Stretchy and Mushy! Heroes of Goo Jit Zu Dino X-Ray are a gooey way for kids to play with Action Figures that make no mess.

1x Goo Jit Zu Hero Figure

Age 4+

title: Apple - AirPods 2 with Charging Case MV7N2ZM/A - White
category: Electronics - Audio & HiFi - Headphones & Headsets - In-Ear
description: Dive into the magical world of your favorite music with the Apple AirPods 2 - the wireless earphones like no other. The AirPods 2019 come with a charging case, and they’re ready to use with your devices as soon as you pull them out of it. After a simple one-tap setup, the second generation AirPods are ready for use with iPhone, Apple Watch, iPad or Mac. When you put them in your ears, they immediately start producing rich, high-quality sound, and if you want to pause simply take them out. Of course, the Apple AirPods 2 2019 are compatible with Siri - in case you want to change the song, adjust the volume, make a call or get directions, just say Hey Siri and enjoy a luxury of having your personal on-the-go assistant. One of the most important things with the Apple AirPods 2 is the play time - they deliver up to 5 hours of listening time and 3 hours of talk time on a single charge, while paired with charging case they provide up to 24 hours of listening time. When you need a quick energy boost, only 15 minutes in the case provide up to 3h of listening time or 2 hours of talk time. The new and powerful Apple H1 headphone chip ensures faster and more stable wireless connection, faster when switching between active devices, and also faster connection time for phone calls. You also have the freedom to use just one or both AirPods, but no matter what you choose, the sound quality always remains at the top level. Specifications: Connection: Bluetooth Charging case connector: Lightning Microphones: dual beamforming microphones Sensors: dual optical sensors, motion-detecting and speech-detecting accelerometer Listening time(single charge): up to 5h Talk time (single charge): up to 3h Paired with charging case: up to 24h listening time, up to 18h talk time AirPods dimensions (each): 16.5mm x 18mm x 40.5mm Charging case dimensions: 44.3mm x 21.3mm x 53.5 mm AirPods weight (each): 4g Charging case dimensions: 38g. System requirements: iPhone, iPad, iPod with iOS 12.2 or later Apple Watch models with watchOS 5.2 or later Mac models with macOS 10.14.4 or later Apple TV models with tvOS 12.2 or later. Packing: Euroblister

title: Sol de Janeiro - Brazilian Bum Bum Cream 240 ml
category: Beauty - Bath and body - Moisturizers - Creams
description:
Award-winning and fragrant body lotion that is a true Brazilian beauty secret.

Brazilian Bum Bum Cream from Sol de Janeiro helps visibly smooth and tighten the look of your skin thanks to the powerful, caffeine-rich Guaraná extract. The fast-absorbing Cupuaçu butter with essential fatty acids provides moisture in depth and makes your skin silky soft. Antioxidant-packed ingredients like Guaraná extract and Açaí oil help prevent environmental damage to your skin. The cream is also enriched with Brazil nut oil, the most selenium-rich food in the world, which supports the skin's natural ability to protect itself, while at the same time giving it a radiant, healthy glow. Brazilian Bum Bum Cream has an addictive scent of Cheirosa '62 with delicious notes of pistachio, salted caramel and vanilla.

Application:

  • Massage in a circular motion to create heat for better absorption and circulation

  • Use it on your bum bum, legs, stomach, arms - anywhere you need radiant skin

Advantage:

  • Award-winning body lotion from Sol de Janeiro

  • Smoothes and tightens the appearance of your skin

  • Essential fatty acids provide plenty of moisture

  • Prevents environmental damage to your skin

  • Gives the skin a radiant, healthy glow

  • Addictive scent of pistachio, salted caramel and vanilla

The serum corrects 8 signs of skin aging: Deep wrinkles, fine lines, firmness, elasticity, resilience, dark spots / hyperpigmentation, dryness and lack of glow. The serum also boosts the skin's energy. The skin appears firmer, smoother, radiant and clear.

title: Rain man - DVD
category: Movies and TV Shows - Movies
description: Charlie Babbitt (Tom Cruise) er en følelseskold opportunist, der alt for længe har glædet sig til de mange rare penge, han skal arve ved sin fars død. Men han får et chok, da han kun arver en gammel Buick og må se hele resten af formuen testamenteret til sin ukendte, ældre bror, Raymond (Dustin Hoffman), hvis eksistens han aldrig har kendt noget til. Raymond, der er autistisk, har boet hele sit liv på en institution, hvor hele hans tilværelse kører identisk minut for minut, dag efter dag, år efter år. Da Charlie opsøger ham, er det naturligvis med personlig vinding i tankerne, og sammen begiver de sig på en rejse, der kommer til at ændre tilværelsen totalt for den ene af dem.

title: Epson - T104 EcoTank 4-Colour Multipack
category: Computers - Printers and Scanners - Ink Printers

Everyday printing
Whether you are printing homework or airline tickets, with this four-color color ink series, you get a reliable, easy-to-use solution.

Reduce ink costs
Are you looking for a printing solution that is ultra-economical? From the first ink set that comes with the printer, you can save an average of 90% of ink costs2.
