title: Tekken 7 + Soul Calibur VI
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 4 - Games
description:
Discover the epic showdown of the long-time clan warfare between members of the Mishima family. Powered by Unreal Engine 4, the legendary fighting game franchise fights back with stunning story-driven cinematic battles and intense duels that can be enjoyed with friends and rivals.

  • UNREAL ENGINE 4 - Powered by Unreal Engine 4, TEKKEN 7 is the best looking TEKKEN game ever through near photo-realistic graphics and the addition of stunning fighting effects.
  • SEAMLESS STORY EXPERIENCE - Powerful cinematic story sequences blending flawlessly into fierce battles that unveils the thrilling storyline of the Mishima family in a very innovative way.
  • ROSTER OF OVER 30 PLAYABLE CHARACTERS - A solid roster of over 30 characters including brand new fighters with one of the world's biggest move-set list in a fighting game that allows for a complete freedom of your fighting style. Find your favourite deadly techniques, martial arts moves and combos to win the fight!
  • STREET FIGHTER CROSS-OVER CHARACTER: AKUMA - Street Fighter's Akuma flawlessly transitions into the 3D space and joins the fray in an epic franchise mash-up complete with all his shoto-style moves and fireballs.
  • ALL NEW BATTLE MECHANICS & MOVES - Classic 1vs1 battles return along with new moves and battle mechanics like Rage Arts, Power Crushes and Rage Drives that make gameplay more accessible for players of all skill levels. Beating your friends in TEKKEN 7 will be based on either focused training or just pure fun.
  • THE FINAL CHAPTER OF THE MISHIMA BLOOD SAGA – TEKKEN 7 represents the final chapter of the 20-year-long Mishima feud. Unveil the monumental ending to the emotionally charged family warfare between members of the Mishima clan as they struggle to settle old scores and battle for control of a global empire, putting the balance of the world in peril&hellip


Sharpen your swords, put on your armour and get ready to fight! SoulCalibur, the game that defined weapon-based 3D fighting games, is back!

Two decades after its first iteration, SoulCalibur VI returns to its roots while taking the gameplay further with brand-new features. Travel through the signature 16th century stages and experience the struggle for the two legendary swords using a complete roster of returning iconic SoulCalibur characters, along with some newcomers!

SoulCalibur has never looked more dynamic or dramatic, intensified by eye-popping graphics powered by Unreal Engine 4.

Features list:

  • The legendary weapon-based 3D fighting game returns to its roots
  • State of the art graphics powered by Unreal Engine 4
  • A complete roster of returning characters and newcomers
  • An epic story mode of the struggle for the two swords
  • Revamped gameplay mechanics for intense showdowns
  • Dynamic fights enhanced by cinematic-styled combat
  • Coming to PS4, Xbox One and PC in 2018

title: Dennis Knudsen PRIVATE - Stimulating Anti Hair Loss Treatment 15 ml
category: Beauty - Hair care - Hair and scalp care - Hair & Scalp Treatments
description:
A product from Denmark's celebrity hairdresser number 1, which helps with hair loss

From Dennis Knudsen PRIVATE - Stimulating Anti Hair Loss Treatment is developed to combat hair loss. This happens when there is a synergy effect in the serum, which comes on the basis of the content of magnificent thyroid glands, soy and wheat germ. It results in a stimulation of hair growth. Just as coffee and caffeine help to get started properly in the morning, so too is added caffeine, which keeps the hair follicles going. A signature ingredient from Dennis Knudsen is extract from oysters and caviar, which fortunately is also found in this hair loss serum - and as an extra luxury, menthol has been added, which contributes to a cooling and refreshing feeling after use.

Application

  • Shake well before use

  • Massage into the scalp once a day

  • The serum should not be rinsed out

Advantage

  • Fantastic serum for hair loss from Dennis Knudsen PRIVATE

  • Stimulates hair growth and fights hair loss

  • Contains magnificent thyme, soybeans and wheat sprouts

  • Caffeine helps the hair follicles

  • Contains extract from oysters and caviar

  • The content of menthol gives a cooling sensation

title: Amazon - Echo Dot 3 - 3rd Gen Smart speaker with Alexa - Black
category: Electronics - Audio & HiFi - Speakers - Smart Speakers
description:
Echo Dot (3rd Gen) - Smart speaker with Alexa

Amazon most popular smart speaker: now with a fabric design and improved speaker for richer and louder sound.
Voice control your music: stream songs from Amazon Music, Spotify, TuneIn and others. You can also listen to audiobooks from Audible.
Bigger, better sound: pair with a second Echo Dot for rich, stereo sound. Fill your home with music with compatible Echo devices in different rooms.
Ready to help: ask Alexa to play music, answer questions, read the news, check the weather, set alarms, control compatible smart home devices and more.
Connect with others: call almost anyone with an Echo device or the Alexa App, hands-free. Instantly drop in on other rooms in your home or make an announcement to every room with a compatible Echo device.
Use another speaker: connect to your own speakers over Bluetooth or with a 3.5 mm audio cable.
Alexa has skills: Alexa is always getting smarter and adding new skills.
Voice control your smart home: turn on lights, adjust thermostats, lock doors and more, with compatible connected devices.
Designed to protect your privacy: built with multiple layers of privacy protection and control, including a Microphone Off button that electronically disconnects the microphones.

title: Badehotellet sæson 9
category: Movies and TV Shows - TV Shows
description:
Badehotellet sæson 9

Sommeren 1945 

Danmark er atter frit, og Amanda kan endelig vende tilbage til hotellet, der de seneste fire år har været besat af den tyske værnemagt. Nu er tyskerne sendt tilbage, hvor de kom fra, og Amanda kan begynde at fjerne sporene efter dem i håb om, at stamgæsterne har mod på at holde endnu en sommerferie ved Vesterhavet.

Det har de heldigvis. Alle er ivrige efter at lægge krigen bag sig og nyde befrielsen sammen med kære, gamle venner. Opholdet kommer også til at byde på nye, overraskende bekendtskaber, blandt andre kommer pigerne Frida og Sarah til at sætte markant præg på sæsonen på hver deres måde.

Men det skal snart vise sig, at selv om lysten er stor til nu endelig at få lov til at se fremad, er ubesvarede spørgsmål fra de fem besættelsesår med som en del af bagagen. Så midt i den berusende befrielsessommer er det også opgørets tid. Og det kommer ikke til at gå stille for sig.

Nu er tyskerne sendt tilbage, hvor de kom fra, og Amanda kan begynde at fjerne sporene efter dem i håb om, at stamgæsterne har mod på at holde endnu en sommerferie ved Vesterhavet.

Det har de heldigvis. Alle er ivrige efter at lægge krigen bag sig og nyde befrielsen sammen med kære, gamle venner. Opholdet kommer også til at byde på nye, overraskende bekendtskaber, blandt andre kommer pigerne Frida og Sarah til at sætte markant præg på sæsonen på hver deres måde.

Men det skal snart vise sig, at selv om lysten er stor til nu endelig at få lov til at se fremad, er ubesvarede spørgsmål fra de fem besættelsesår med som en del af bagagen. Så midt i den berusende befrielsessommer er det også opgørets tid. Og det kommer ikke til at gå stille for sig.

title: Calvin Klein - One Summer Eau de Toilette 100 ml
category: Beauty - Perfume - Eau de Toilette
description:
An amazing unisex summer scent that makes time stand still. This limited edition has a fresh and light scent that fits the summer perfectly, this Eau de Toilette opens up at the top with beautiful notes from sea salt, sage and orange, among other things, to make it super fresh. At the bottom, the notes of amber, ginger and driftwood appear, giving the scent a nice warmth so that it collects. Let yourself and your surroundings be pampered and feel the summer's warm rays raining down on you as soon as you put it on. With One Summer Eau de Toilette by Calvin Klein you will undoubtedly become the fresh breath of the day.

Notes: 

  • Sea salt, sage, orange, amber, ginger and driftwood.

Calvin Klein

Calvin Klein is a fashion house founded in 1968 by American fashion designer Calvin Klein. The company is headquartered in Midtown Manhattan, New York City and is currently owned by Phillips-Van Heusen. Calvin Klein is one of the leading fashion design and marketing studios in the world. It designs and markets women's and men's designer collection apparel and a range of other products that are manufactured and marketed through an extensive network of licensing agreements and other arrangements worldwide.

title: Kirby Triple Deluxe (AUS)
category: Video Games and Consoles - Nintendo 3DS - Games
description: Kirby is back and ready to take the 3DS by storm! Enjoy an awesome singleplayer adventure or the competitive multiplayer battle mode.

title: theHunter: Call of the Wild Edition 2019 Edition
category: Video Games and Consoles - Xbox One - Games
description:
theHunter: Call of the Wild Edition offers the most immersive hunting experience ever created. Step into a beautiful open world teeming with life, from majestic deer, ghost-like lynx and awe-inspiring cape buffalo, down to the countless birds, critters and insects of the wilderness. Every inch of the 100-square mile (256 square kilometer) world is crafted using Apex, award-winning technology crafted by Avalanche Studios during a decade of developing explosive action and hunting games. In addition to its rich single player experience, theHunter: Call of the Wild 2019 Edition offers unique multiplayer options – cooperative and competitive – for up to 8 players. Share the ultimate hunting experience, and earn those bragging rights! 

In addition to the original content of theHunter: Call of the Wild, the 2019 Edition also includes the frozen and harsh Medved-Taiga reserve, as well as the rolling grasslands of the Vurhonga Savanna reserve. Explore the various reserves in All Terrain Vehicles, camp out in the wild using tents and ground blinds, and select between a wide range of specialized weapons to best take down your target.

KEY FEATURES: Explore a Vast Open World. By Foot or ATV.

Explore 100 square miles  (256 square kilometer) of varied terrain, ranging from the open farm fields and dense forests to frozen tundras and the savanna. The vast world of theHunter: Call of the Wild is split up into separate and distinct hunting reserves, each one filled with surprises and memorable moments.

Take on missions and challenges from the locals, or go off the beaten path. Discover lookouts, hunting towers and outposts. Tired of walking between your hunts? Get the ATV Saber 4x4 and drive around! This capable vehicle will carry you across rough terrain at breakneck speeds. Exploring the open world has never been more fun.

DIFFERENT SPECIES DIFFERENT CHALLENGE

With it’s 4 diverse reserves and national parks you will encounter 25 species to hunt (and we keep adding new ones) each providing its own challenge. From the classic and most popular medium game like whitetail deer to big game like Bears and Elks. Track the ever elusive Lynx in frozen forests of Medved-Taiga, take to the skies in Hirschfelden and bag some goose or meet the cape Buffalo while you explore the the hot Vurhonga Savanna.

Become a Hunter. Design the Hunt. Over X weapons are available to in-game and you can equip yourself with rifles, handguns and bows and customize them with scopes and different ammunition types. Find and master your favorites. Practice and steady your aim at the shooting range. Develop your character by unlocking various skills and equipment. Learn how to use callers and scents, but above all else, study your prey: pay close attention to animal behavior, traits and patterns of movement. New to hunting? Not a problem. Intelligent systems will aid and assist to make sure you get the most out of your hunt, whether you’re a hopeful novice or grizzled veteran.

Share Hunting Experiences and the Hunter Club. Earn Bragging Rights.

In addition to its rich single player experience, theHunter: Call of the Wild offers unique multiplayer options. Join up to 8 friends (or complete strangers!) in cooperative and competitive modes. Enjoy a wide range of in-game challenges and events, with the Hunt Club. Take part in daily, weekly or community events to earn in-game rewards.

Hunting is more rewarding and exciting with friends, so share your experiences and earn those bragging rights.

The Ultimate Hunting Experience

  • Enjoy a next-generation huting experience featuring stunning visuals and a highly immersive soundscape
  • Explore a vast open world with 4 different reserves and over 100 square miles of varied terrain
  • Track and hunt 25 different species, from geese and deers to predators like the bear and lynx.
  • Discover a rich single player storyline or share your hunting experience with up to 8 players in co-op or competitive play
  • Develop your character by unlocking a wide range of weapons skills and equipment as you progress.

title: Just Dance 2018
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 3 - Games
description:
No matter where you come from, how old you are, if you are a panda or a carrot: turn up the volume and get ready to unleash your inner dancer, because Just Dance 2018 brings out the dancer in everyone! The biggest music video game franchise of all time*, with over 63 million units sold** is coming back this fall. Whether you are a party starter, a young dancer in the making or a pro dancer looking for new challenges, it's never been so easy to Just Dance!

Join a community of more than 118 million players around the world and bust out your best moves! Dance your heart out to 24K Magic by Bruno Mars, Side to Side by Ariana Grande ft. Nicki Minaj, The Way I Are (Dance With Somebody) by Bebe Rexha ft. Lil Wayne and Chantaje by Shakira ft. Maluma. Relive classics including Daddy Cool by Groove Century, or if K-Pop is your thing get down to Bubble Pop by Hyuna!

From the hottest hits to family favourites, dance to 40 new tracks, including:

  • Rockabye – Clean Bandit Ft. Sean Paul & Anne-Marie
  • 24K Magic – Bruno Mars
  • Side To Side – Ariana Grande Ft. Nicki Minaj
  • Chantaje – Shakira Ft. Maluma
  • Naughty Girl – Beyoncé
  • The Way I Are (Dance With Somebody) – Bebe Rexha Ft. Lil Wayne
  • Automaton – Jamiroquai
  • Bubble Pop! – HyunA
  • Love Ward – Hatsune Miku
  • Make It Jingle – Big Freedia
  • Daddy Cool – Groove Century
  • &hellipand many more!

The Just Dance game mode instantly turns any place into a dancefloor! (Nintendo Switch, Wii U, Xbox One, PS4)

  • Enjoy curated and new content all year long with a huge catalogue of more than 300 songs thanks to Just Dance Unlimited1, the dance-on-demand subscription streaming service. A 3-month trial is included with every copy of Just Dance 2018!
  • With the new interface, browsing the game has never been so easy, so that you're only a couple clicks away from dancing!
  • If you feel like exercising, just change the scoring and start tracking the calories you are burning. You can even create your own workout routines with your favorite tracks!
  • Track your progress and complete Daily Quests to get exclusive rewards. You might even learn about the secret lives of our coaches!

The youngest players will have a blast with the most fun dance playground: the brand new Kids mode! (Nintendo Switch, Wii U, Xbox One, PS4)

  • 8 new choreographies were created with the help of kid development experts to encourage healthy movement.
  • Thanks to a tailored interface, scoring, and special characters, kids will be able to safely enjoy the game in complete autonomy with positive and supportive feedback.

Join the biggest online party in the World Dance Floor and compete with players from all around the world! (Nintendo Switch, Wii U, Xbox One, PS4)

  • The newly revamped World Dance Floor brings more challenges in co-op or competition!
  • Dance online with your friends and participate in massive cross-platform events. Join special tournaments or team up to defeat bosses.

Making the most of the Nintendo Switch unique capabilities! (Nintendo Switch)

  • 5 exclusive Double Rumble choreographies puts the control in both of your hands for the first time in a Just Dance game – hold a Joy-Con in each hand, and feel the vibrations as you experience what it's like to play in a Mariachi band, or take charge of a 5 star kitchen.
  • Replicate the moves and feel the vibes of the music in the palms of your hands thanks the Joy-Cons' unique HD Rumble vibration system.
  • Also more exclusive choreographies are to be announced exclusively for the Nintendo Switch!

And all of your favorite features are back on old-gen consoles! (Wii, PlayStation®3, Xbox 360)

  • World Dance Floor: The fan favourite online multiplayer dance floor is back! Dance live with players around the world and enjoy special live events like tournaments, and collaborate with other dancers to unlock special prizes, and more!
  • Autodance: After finishing a song, the game automatically generates an Autodance - a funny mini-video of your performance that you can share (camera needed).
  • Community Remix: The best performances on a selected song, submitted by players are selected every two months and integrated in a Community Remix video!

category: Toys - Figures - Kids TV and Movie Characters
description:
The cute dog Bluey loves to play and with this play set you can invite the cute dog home to play.

Bluey, known from the TV series, invites you to have fun and imaginative play with this fun mini play set. Have fun with Bluey in the park with this cute park play set. All included figures have moving parts so they can be used for all kinds of adventures. Collect all the Bluey sets and recreate funny scenes from the TV series.

  • Includes: 1 figure, 1 play set

  • Recommended age: 3+

title: Remington - Graphite Series Personal Groomer G3 PG3000
category: Health and Personal Care - Personal Care - Shaving and hair removal - Trimmers, Clippers & Body Groomers - Facial Trimmers
description:
Graphite G3 is your all-in-one solution so you do not have to change grooming tool to change style. With grooming from top to toe, you can create many different personal looks with one and the same product. Self-sharpening blades with graphite coating that provides optimal lubricity and allows you to create your own style in a comfortable way. With six versatile tools to put on the machine, you can easily manage your grooming routine with Graphite G3. With the double, adjustable comb, you can shave your beard and hair to between 2 and 20 mm and create a variety of looks from short to long beards and from short hair hairstyles to long hair hairstyles. With the linear trimmer, the nose, eyebrows and hair are always well-groomed. Use the 1.5 mm comb to create a look with 3-day stubble or keep your hair length straight with the 3 mm comb. If you are more into precision shaving, you can use the TST precision trimmer for your micro stumps. The removable equipment can be washed after use. When you have finished the appliance, put it in place with all removable equipment in the practical bag for storage. Graphite G3 gives you the freedom to create your style wherever you are. The machine is wireless with 40 minutes of operating time, which gives you plenty of time for your personal care, so you can create your very own look. Whether you are trimming, shaving, grooming or styling, the Graphite G3 is the ideal all-in-one solution. for personal care so you can create your very own style.

Product info:

  • Leaves with graphite coating - designed to slide easily and comfortably
  • Self-sharpening blades
  • 30mm main blade - hair & beard trimmer
  • Linear nose and ear trimmer
  • TST Precision Trimmer
  • Double adjustable comb for beard & hair (2-20mm)
  • 1.5mm & 3mm fixed combs for trimming beard stubble & body hair
  • Wireless
  • Washable heads
  • Storage bag
  • 40 minutes operating time
  • 16 hours charging time
  • LED indicator light for charging
  • EU-plug

title: L.O.L. - Surprise,  Queens Big Surprise  (579939)
category: Toys - Dolls and Dollhouses - Fashion Dolls & Accessories - Fashion Dolls
description: Look forward to a brand new theme with new characters, fashion clothes and surprises. Big Surprise offers lots of Glitter, Queens and Fashion.

title: Tomb Raider - Game of the Year Edition
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 3 - Games
description:
Tomb Raider is a fresh reimagining of the classic action-adventure franchise and will explore the intense and gritty origin story of an iconic character. In the game, Lara Croft will ascend from a frightened young woman on her first adventure and emerge as a hardened survivor. Armed with only her instincts and her innate ability to push beyond the limits of human endurance, Lara must fight, explore, and use her intelligence to unravel the dark history of a forgotten island and escape its relentless hold. With high-octane cinematic set pieces, visceral third-person combat, and large levels for Lara to navigate and explore, Tomb Raider is aiming to reinvent the action genre and recapture fans' imagination with the original female video game heroine.

Game of the Year Edition includes all downloadable content.

title: Call Of Duty Modern Warfare 2
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 3 - Games
description:
The call of duty needs answering once again, as the blockbusting first person shooter series returns to the modern day. A direct sequel to Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare, you now play new character Sgt Gary Roach Sanderson. Your commander is Soap from the first game as you join a multinational anti-terrorist squad out to stop Russian ultra nationalists.

Watch your squad grow from inexperienced rookies to veteran warriors A snowmobile race is just one of the new vehicle sections. Modern Warfare 2 is a direct sequel to Call of Duty 4. You'll journey all around the world in the fight against terrorism

Many of the details on the game are still sketchy but it promises to feature an even more varied series of locales than the ever before, including a snowbound enemy camp that starts with a daredevil mountain climb across the ice before a stealthy infiltration goes awry and you have to run for your life by commandeering a snowmobile.

But that's just the single player mode - the multiplayer is expected to be even more ground-breaking than before, with new co-op options and even more rewards and perks for competitive play.

  • Call of Warfare: Stunning cinematic action, including new underwater missions, new gadgets such as the motion detector and new vehicles including snowmobiles and more.
  • Rough guide: Massive globe-spanning adventure sees you travelling to the deserts of Afghanistan, the slums of Rio de Janerio and the wilderness of Russia.
  • Bigger world: New larger levels allow you to tackle missions however you want: will you try a frontal assault or a more stealthy approach from another angle?
  • Special co-op: New Special Forces mode will introduce two player co-operative play for the first time, in a series of non-story missions.
  • Be the best: Competitive multiplayer is even bigger and better than before, with all-new rewards for everyone from raw recruits to the most experienced players.

title: Devil May Cry 5 (Special Editon)
category: Video Games and Consoles - Xbox One - Games
description:
The Devil May Cry® series, known for its blend of high-octane stylized action and otherworldly characters, grew to be a global success since its first release in 2001. The main protagonist of the series is Dante, a demon hunter and son of the Legendary Dark Knight and demon Sparda and human Eva. Throughout the Devil May Cry series, the eternal battle between the forces of good and evil plays out through the lens of this supernatural family drama, as the Son of Sparda Dante, seeks vengeance for his brother’s corruption and his mother’s murder. 

Now, 10 years since the last iteration, Devil May Cry® 4, Director Hideaki Itsuno and the core team have reunited to conclude the long awaited Sons of Sparda saga. 

Several years have passed in Devil May Cry 5 and the threat of demonic power, long since forgotten, has returned to menace the world once again. The demonic invasion begins with the seeds of a “demon tree” taking root in Red Grave City. This hellish incursion attracts the attention of the young demon hunter, Nero, an ally of Dante who now finds himself without his demonic arm, the source of much of his power. As Nero heads to Red Grave City in his motorhome named “Devil May Cry” with his partner Nico, he ruminates on how everything started. The loss of his demonic arm, the demonic invasion, and Dante’s unknown whereabouts. Things must be settled once and for all. 

Capcom’s proprietary in-house RE Engine ensures that with Devil May Cry 5, the series continues to achieve new heights in fidelity, featuring ground-breaking graphics that utilise photorealistic character designs and stunning lighting and environmental effects. The game features three playable characters, each of which offer a radically different stylish combat play style as they take on the city overrun with demons. Adrenaline-fuelled boss fights play out against destructible environments in the striking streets of Red Grave City. 

FEATURES

  • Wield the Yamato – Take the stylish action to a new level as Vergil, Dante’s long-time rival and twin brother. DMC5 players on PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC will also be able to access all Vergil content in the Playable Character: Vergil DLC at a later date.
  • New Gameplay Modes – Test your skills against the unique challenges of the new Legendary Dark Knight Mode and Turbo Mode.
    • Legendary Dark Knight Mode: Fans seeking an added challenge can pit their skills and style against a Crazy amount of enemies in the perilous Legendary Dark Knight Mode.
    • Turbo Mode: Adrenaline junkies can push their reaction times to the limit against the increased speed of Turbo Mode, which ups the rate of gameplay by 20 percent to allow for even more rapid and fluid combo opportunities.
  • Ascend the Bloody Palace – Tackle the increasingly difficult floors of the Bloody Palace challenge mode, originally introduced as free post-launch content for Devil May Cry 5. Only the most skilled demon hunters will make it to the top floor to face the ultimate challenge.
  • High-Octane Stylized Action – Play as four different characters: Nero, Dante, V, and the newly-added Vergil. Cut a path through the ruins of Redgrave City with each character using radically different play styles as they take on the teaming hordes of demons.
  • Groundbreaking Graphics – Developed with Capcom’s in-house proprietary RE engine, DMC5SE brings the visual quality to new heights, with graphics that utilize photorealistic character designs, stunning lighting and environmental effects. These superb visuals have been enhanced with ray tracing technology**, 4K visuals, and increased framerates, all with minimal load times.
  • Vivid 3D Audio – Maintain their Smokin’ Sexy Style through the frenetic action and cutting chords by adapting to the sounds of enemy movements above, below, and to any side of your character with realistic detail.

description:
The Devil May Cry® series, known for its blend of high-octane stylized action and otherworldly characters, grew to be a global success since its first release in 2001. The main protagonist of the series is Dante, a demon hunter and son of the Legendary Dark Knight and demon Sparda and human Eva. Throughout the Devil May Cry series, the eternal battle between the forces of good and evil plays out through the lens of this supernatural family drama, as the Son of Sparda Dante, seeks vengeance for his brother’s corruption and his mother’s murder. 

Now, 10 years since the last iteration, Devil May Cry® 4, Director Hideaki Itsuno and the core team have reunited to conclude the long awaited Sons of Sparda saga. 

Several years have passed in Devil May Cry 5 and the threat of demonic power, long since forgotten, has returned to menace the world once again. The demonic invasion begins with the seeds of a “demon tree” taking root in Red Grave City. This hellish incursion attracts the attention of the young demon hunter, Nero, an ally of Dante who now finds himself without his demonic arm, the source of much of his power. As Nero heads to Red Grave City in his motorhome named “Devil May Cry” with his partner Nico, he ruminates on how everything started. The loss of his demonic arm, the demonic invasion, and Dante’s unknown whereabouts. Things must be settled once and for all. 

Capcom’s proprietary in-house RE Engine ensures that with Devil May Cry 5, the series continues to achieve new heights in fidelity, featuring ground-breaking graphics that utilise photorealistic character designs and stunning lighting and environmental effects. The game features three playable characters, each of which offer a radically different stylish combat play style as they take on the city overrun with demons. Adrenaline-fuelled boss fights play out against destructible environments in the striking streets of Red Grave City.

title: Wella - Invigo Balance Aqua Pure Shampoo 1000 ml
category: Beauty - Hair care - Shampoos - Shampoos
description:
This is a super effective cleansing shampoo, suitable for all hair types. With this shampoo you will clean your hair gently but effectively. This shampoo will clean your hair of dirt, product residues as well as sebum from the scalp. At the same time, the shampoo protects your hair from external influences from the environment. The shampoo contains both caring and refreshing ingredients that ensure clean and fresh hair. Contains, among other things, extract from vines and lotus flower. The natural ingredients have a cleansing and nourishing effect on your scalp, while keratin strengthens your hair so that it is left more resistant.

Application:

Distribute the shampoo in the wet hair
Foam well and rinse.

Deviously Dark Bronzing Lotion from Australian Gold boosts the natural production of melanin and gives an intense color. It is perfect for you with a light skin tone and is created with hemp seed oil and omega 3 and 6, which nourishes your skin and makes it radiant. title: HORROR TALES: The Wine
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 5 - Games
description:
Explore a post-pandemic fictional Mediterranean island and confront your fears! Immerse yourself in aseemingly abandoned city and struggle to find a precious Banydebosc red wine bottle to cure your lovedones. But be aware your Nemesis is watching you.

WARNING: Certain effects that may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitiveepilepsy can be disabled in the Accessibility Menu included in the game.

  • Mediterranean Horror: Explore the forsaken capital of an awe-inspiring archipelago. Do not letyourself be fooled by the gentle sea breeze, the Mediterranean vistas or the comfortingsummer sun. Since the Devil's Fevers pandemic ravaged the city, it was abandoned, and nowonly horrific nightmares await there.
  • Survive your Nemesis: Someone is relentlessly hunting you. Suffer and agonize while you tryto run away from the encounters with this strange stalker obsessed with you.
  • Intense Challenges: Solve environmental riddles, physics puzzles and other similar challengesin an interconnected vertical world. Even while being chased and hunted.
  • Accessibility and Photomode: Tweak more than 20 Accessibility settings to create a tailoredexperience for you. Use the Photomode to make perfect shots and unlock many secrets usingit.

title: Hasbro Gaming - Game of Life Classic nordic (F0800)
category: Toys - Games - Board Games
description:
Now it's time to fasten your seatbelt, because a wild and exciting ride on life's long country road awaits!

There is a need for someone who is good at inserting colorful pegs and turning around on the exciting game board so that the development of life can be illustrated, everything from birth to retirement.

All stop fields on the game board are important, as each player has to make big decisions. Do you want to get married? Do you want to start a family? Do you want to retire early?

The game includes action cards, which allow players to choose their own destiny. This game calls for all brave players, because there are also some financial risks! Do you want to invest in a specific number when it spins around so you can get even more money? Or are you afraid of losing too much? The player who has the most money in the end, wins the game.

Hasbro - Game of Life is a fantastic family game, for the cozy evenings in the weekends, where cosiness has a high priority on the agenda! Truly a game that brings the family together for a fun and exciting evening,

Product info:

  • Recommended age: From 8 years

  • Number of players: 2-4

  • Game board, 90 cards (55 action cards, 20 career cards, 11 house cards, 4 investment cards), 4 cars, 36 picks, money pack and game guide

title: Ecooking - Solcreme Ansigt SPF 50 50 ml
category: Beauty - Sun Care - Sunscreen - Face
description:
Protect your skin from the sun's harmful rays with this sunscreen with sunfactor 50.

Sunscreen for the Face SPF 50 from Ecooking contains three broad-spectrum chemical sunscreens that protect broadly against both UVA and UVB rays. Chemical filters penetrate the top layer of the skin, where they absorb UV rays and thus prevent radiation from reaching the skin and damaging it. The sunscreen has UVA protection that protects against skin aging and UVB protection that protects against the sun's rays. It is also enriched with a Swedish, exclusive algae, organic aloe vera and hyaluronic acid, which keeps your skin hydrated, protects the skin from pollution and UV light and increases the SPF factor in sunscreen. The sunscreen is Danish-developed, Danish-produced, water-repellent, easy to apply and absorbed quickly into the skin.

Application:

  • Apply an even layer, 15 min. before going out in the sun

  • Use too much rather than too little

  • Apply on the face several times a day

  • Tip: Mix a few drops of self-tanner in sunscreen to help the color on its way while taking care of your skin

  • Sunscreen for the face can replace your day cream during the periods you use it

  • If you use it as a day cream, you can add a few drops of oil or serum.

Advantage:

  • Sunscreen for the face from Ecooking

  • With sun factor 50

  • Protects widely against both UVA and UVB rays

  • With Swedish, natural algae that moisturize the skin and protect the skin from pollution and UV light

  • Organic Aloe vera, which helps moisturize the skin, improves skin elasticity and strengthens the skin from within

  • Water repellent

  • Easy to apply

  • Easily absorbed into the skin

  • Can be used by all skin types

  • Allergy certified

  • Vegan

  • Dermatologically tested

  • Perfume free

title: Paradise Alley
category: Movies and TV Shows - Movies
description: Sylvester Stallone is fighting the odds again, this time in the wrestling ring. As Cosmo Carboni, he and his two brothers dream of getting out of Hell’s Kitchen (circa 1946) and into the big time. The exit signs point to Paradise Alley, a sleazy private club where the floorshow consists of raucous wrestling matches with big purses. Stallone not only starred in and wrote this action-packed film, he also made his directorial debut in this tale of three guys who could take anything Hell’s Kitchen could dish out.

title: The Great Outdoors
category: Movies and TV Shows - Movies
description: All vacation-bound family man Chet Ripley (John Candy) wants is to relax and spend some quality timewith his family. But when his obnoxiousbrother-in-law Roman Craig (Dan Aykroyd) shows up unannounced and uninvited with his kooky family in tow, the result is anything but restful. It’s a vacationer’s worst nightmare when each of Chet’s plans for rest and relaxation is ruined by his oblivious in-law. And when Roman’s clan outstays its welcome and pushes Chet to the limit of his patience, the war is on to see who is best equipped to enjoy The Great Outdoors! John Candy and Dan Aykroyd are at the top of their game in this uproarious comedy from the mind of John Hughes.

The super cute boxes come in a set of 3 pieces and bring order and style to any children's room and playroom. title: Story of Seasons: Friends Of Mineral Town
category: Video Games and Consoles - Nintendo Switch - Games
description:
• Rediscover one of STORY OF SEASONS’ most beloved entries: This Nintendo Switch remake of the classic game preserves the compelling gameplay, colourful characters and rustic charm of the original 2003 Game Boy Advance release. With buttery-smooth HD visuals and a heartwarming reimagining of the iconic locale, series veterans and newcomers will soon find themselves welcomed by the gentle rhythms of Mineral Town
  • Live the simple life in Mineral Town: Tap into the power of nature as you breathe life back into your grandfather’s farm, tending crops and raising livestock to earn your keep. With more than 20 varieties of crops to grow, and animals ranging from alpacas to angora bunnies, no day is the same as seasons cycle and new skills await
  • Forge friendships with the townsfolk and win their hearts: Mineral Town is full of friendly faces willing to help you find your feet in your new hometown. Get to know the locals and learn their stories as you go about your daily life, and you might even find love along the way!
  • Activities galore for days off from the farm: Whether it’s high-tailing in horseraces, catching a champion trout or showcasing your culinary creativity, the busy calendar full of festivals means that there’s never a dull day in Mineral Town. If you’re looking for a quieter time, take yourself away to the local hot spring, delve deep into the mines, or seek out the seasonal secrets of the town

title: Outpost
category: Movies and TV Shows - Movies
genre: W, a, r, ,,  , D, r, a, m, a
description:
The Outpost is a 2020 American war film directed by Rod Lurie, based on the non-fiction book The Outpost: An Untold Story of American Valor.

Based on the bestselling novel by CNN correspondent Jake Tapper. The true story of the Battle of Kamdesh, Afghanistan, in which 53 American soldiers were surrounded by 400 Taliban insurgents at the world's deadliest military outpost, Keaton.

The base was originally built to engage locals in community projects, but was located at the bottom of a steep valley and was constantly exposed to threats and attacks. When a decision was finally made to close down the base, the Taliban found out and attacked with full force.

title: Maxi-Cosi - MC Mica - Authentic Grey
category: Baby and Children - Car Seats & Accessories - Car Seats
description:
Placing your little one in a car seat has never been more relaxed with the 360 ° rotation options on the Maxi-Cosi Mica. Installation with ISOFIX for easy mind and in accordance with i-Size safety standards, it allows you to rotate the car seat for easy placement of your little one. This rotating car seat makes every trip relaxed and hassle-free for both parent and baby. The mica can be reclined in every 360 ° position, so your little one is always comfortable. It can be used from birth up to 4 years thanks to our soft newborn inserts, in forward and backward facing positions. For optimal safety, we equipped Mica with both i-Size safety - the latest and highest safety standards - and superior G-CELL technology. Our rotating car seat, Mica, offers easy ISOFIX installation. And a practical support leg provides stability, even when your child is not sitting in the car seat. Check the Maxi-Cosi Mica user manual for the correct installation. Maxi-Cosi Mica has visual indicators that let you know when the car seat is correctly attached to your car's ISOFIX anchorage points. When attached properly, the car seat can remain in the car. This way, it is no longer cumbersome to take your little one on a trip. All you have to do is position your baby and fasten the seat belt correctly. Over 50 million babies have been carried home from the hospital using Maxi-Cosi. As a leading specialist in child mobility, the safety of your child is our highest priority. Our intuitive and innovative car seats protect your child safely and help you as a family with joy into the future. External crash test results for dynamic safety and ease of use are recommended by Maxi-Cosis car seat. We designed our Mica rotating car seat not only for the convenience of parents, but also included our most innovative safety technology: G-CELL. This technology absorbs crashes and protects your child from damage in a side impact. In addition, Maxi-Cosi Mica also complies with the latest and highest safety standards in-Size, and your child up to 4 years can travel easily backwards. With comfort and convenience to the next level, Maxi-Cosi Mica makes every trip a breeze. It allows you as a parent to position your little one comfortably using the easy-to-get-in step cushion. The car seat also gives the back a break thanks to the easy 360 ° rotation with one click. The visibility of the five-point belt is ideal, so correct installation is guaranteed! Mica can be used directly from birth thanks to the comfortable newborn insert. As your little one gets older, he / she will remain comfortable thanks to the sleeping resting position, headrest with memory foam and built-in back ventilation. Cool and comfortable trips are guaranteed for up to 4 years! On the road, your baby may get car sickness, or snacks and drinks may not always end up where they should be. No matter what happens, Maxi-Cosis car seat covers can be easily removed and machine washed.

Product info: 

  • 360 ° rotation with a single click
  • Rotation is possible in all reclined positions for easy maneuverability
  • Light-in step cushion to facilitate installation of children
  • Extra hooks keep the harness open while you put your child in the car seat
  • Simultaneous adjustment of seat belt and headrest height
  • ISOFIX connectors and support legs provide the safest, easiest and fastest way to install a car seat
  • The cover can be easily removed
  • The cover is easy to wash and clean in the washing machine
  • Sleeping rest position for comfortable walks
  • The seat has extra upholstery for a comfortable seat
  • Adjustable headrest with soft memory foam for extra comfort
  • The baby hug insert adds safety and comfort to the newborn
  • ClimaFlow: Built-in ventilation in the backrest to keep your child at the right temperature
  • Adhere to the latest and highest safety standards: i-Size (R129)
  • Superior G-CELL side-impact technology for better shock absorption
  • Headrest with protective memory foam for extra safety
  • 5-point seat belt for best restraining child in case of rigid body parts in the event of a forward collision
  • Car seat can be used in rear-facing position for up to 4 years
  • Audible and visual indicators confirm proper fit and minimize the risk of incorrect installation
  • Can be used for 4 years, from birth up to 4 years
  • For children between 40-105 cm

L'Oréal

The L'Oréal Paris Brand Division of L'Oréal Canada Inc. is a total beauty care company that combines the latest in technology with the highest in quality for the ultimate in luxury beauty. L'Oréal was founded by Eugène Schueller in 1909 and has since become the number one cosmetic group in the world. L'Oréal Paris is a truly global beauty brand with many internationally renowned products. For most, the name L'Oréal is immediately evocative of the brand's signature phrase, Because I'm Worth It. . Today, it represents the essence of the L'Oréal Paris brand as a whole, a spirit which is about helping every woman embrace her unique beauty while reinforcing her innate sense of self-worth. As the biggest beauty brand in the world, L'Oréal Paris has an unparalleled commitment to technology, research and innovation, providing groundbreaking, high-quality products for women, men, and children of all ages and ethnicities.

L'Oréal offers all types of beauty products within major beauty categories makeup, skin care and hair care. The worldwide success of legendary franchises such as Color Riche lipstick, Revitalift skin care or Men Expert skin care for men, reflect in particular L'Oréal's unique expertise within beauty products.

title: Paw Patrol - Paw Patroller 2,0 (6060442)
category: Toys - Figures - Kids TV and Movie Characters
description:
Join Ryder and the PAW Patrol on rescue adventures with the PAW Patroller. This action-packed team rescue vehicle comes with Ryder and his ATV and features transforming doors, dual vehicle launchers and realistic sounds.

When trouble strikes, get ready to roll to the rescue. There’s room inside the PAW Patroller for two vehicles (not included) and room on the outside for four more PAW Patrol cars. Load Ryder and another pup up the ramp at the back, and use your imagination to play out your rescue missions. Push the button on the side of the PAW Patroller for an epic door transformation.

The vehicle’s sides flip up, revealing dual vehicle launchers. Pull the lever to position the launchers and press the launcher buttons to send your vehicles racing to the rescue. Then, press the button on the top of the PAW Patroller to hear sound effects straight from the show. This PAW Patrol toy brings the excitement and adventure of the hit show to life. The PAW Patroller with Ryder and ATV toys for 3-year-old boys and girls is the perfect gift for kids and PAW Patrol fans.

Team up with the rest of the pups and their rescue toy vehicles (each sold separately) and help save the day. Launch to the rescue with PAW Patrol and the PAW Patroller.

Product Features

  • EPIC DOOR TRANSFORMATION: Press the button on the side of the PAW Patroller for an exciting door transformation&mdashthe sides pop open and lift up, revealing dual vehicle launchers inside.
  • DUAL VEHICLE LAUNCHERS: Load Ryder, his ATV (included) and another pup and vehicle (not included) up the ramp at the back, pull the lever and push the buttons to launch your PAW Patrol figures and vehicles to the rescue.
  • FITS 6 PAW PATROL TOY CARS: There’s room inside the PAW Patroller for 2 vehicles, plus room on top for 4 additional PAW Patrol vehicles and toy figures from your collection (sold separately).
  • ACTION FIGURE, VEHICLE AND SOUND EFFECTS: Comes with a Ryder PAW Patrol figure, ATV and realistic sound effects&mdashpress the button on the top. 
  • 3 LR44 batteries included. Preschool toys for ages 3 and up.
  • Product Dimensions Approx - H37.16 x W17.78 x L73.66 cm

title: Philip Kingsley - Elasticizer Extreme 150 ml
category: Beauty - Hair care - Hair and scalp care - Hair & Scalp Treatments
description:
Intensive pre-shampoo hair treatment that helps restore moisture and prevent breakage.

Elasticizer Extreme from Philip Kingsley is ideal for very porous and dry hair. Elasticizer was the world's first deep conditioning pre-shampoo hair treatment, and it's full of effective ingredients like Castor Oil and Hydrolyzed Elastin that rehydrate your hair. The product is suitable for all hair types.

Application:

  • Apply before washing with shampoo

  • Moisten your hair with water and apply Elasticizer in middle lengths and ends

  • Now cover your hair with a bathing cap or towel

  • The heat helps to open your hair strands so that they can absorb nutrients properly and efficiently

  • Let sit for at least 20 minutes

  • There is no maximum time - you can even sleep with Elasticizer in your hair

  • Rinse thoroughly, then shampoo and conditioner as usual (those with fine hair should use shampoo twice)

  • Suitable for use on colored hair

  • Note: Do not use Elasticizer 72 hours before or after coloring your hair, as this may affect how the color develops during this period

Advantage:

  • Nourishing hair treatment from Philip Kingsley

  • Deep conditioning adds elasticity, shine, fullness and makes hair more manageable

  • Hydrolyzed Elastin is a protein that penetrates your hair strands and increases its elasticity without weighing down your hair

  • Elasticity is what gives your hair stretch and strength so it will break less

  • Also suitable for very overworked and damaged Caucasian hair

  • Contains higher active doses of the ingredients found in Elasticizer to counteract the unique structure, styling and care of African-Caribbean hair or highly damaged Caucasian hair

  • Provides immediate care, hydration and nourishment

  • Leaves hair full of elasticity, volume and reflective shine

title: Philip Kingsley - Elasticizer 150 ml
category: Beauty - Hair care - Hair and scalp care - Hair & Scalp Treatments
description:
Super caring pre-shampoo treatment that gives elasticity, control, fullness and shine to all hair types.

With frequent use of this Elasticizer from Philip Kingsley, your hair is left stronger and healthier with fewer breaks. The product is created with a multi-award winning formula. Elasticizer was the world's first pre-shampoo cure that works in depth and is full of effective ingredients like Castor Oil and Hydrolyzed Elastin that rehydrates your hair. It is suitable for all hair types and will give your hair strength and suppleness as well as protect against everyday styling routines such as brushing, blow drying and heat styling.

Application:

  • Apply before washing with shampoo

  • Moisten your hair with water and apply Elasticizer in middle lengths and ends

  • Now cover your hair with a bathing cap or towel

  • The heat helps to open your hair strands so that they can absorb nutrients correctly and efficiently

  • Let sit for at least 20 minutes

  • There is no maximum time - you can even sleep with Elasticizer in your hair

  • Rinse thoroughly, then shampoo and conditioner as usual (those with fine hair should use shampoo twice)

  • Suitable for use in colored hair

  • Note: Do not use Elasticizer 72 hours before or after coloring your hair, as this may affect how the color develops during this period.

Advantage:

  • Fantastic pre-shampoo cure from Philip Kingsley

  • Deep conditioning adds elasticity, shine, fullness and makes hair more manageable

  • Hydrolyzed Elastin is a protein that penetrates your hair strands and increases its elasticity without weighing down your hair

  • Gives hair strength so it breaks less

  • Castor Oil helps the hair retain moisture in the hair fibers

  • Olive oil contains high amounts of vitamin E and essential fatty acids that give the hair moisture and nourishment

  • Glycerin helps your hair retain moisture as well as makes the hair soft and lovely

  • Paraben- and fragrance-free

description:

title: Playmobil - 1.2.3 - Recycling Truck (6774)
category: Toys - Figures - Urban & Village Life
description:
Garbage Truck back lid with sorting function. Playset includes 1 driver Accessories: 1 recycling truck, 1 yellow bag, 1 blue bin

Playmobil is classic toys in good quality from Germany.

The miniature worlds of Playmobil encourages children to imagine, invent and create. Creating worlds around their Playmobil friends, inventing characters and scenes, imagining how they interact and what happens next. Playmobil is excellent for solo play or for children to play together learning to co-operate and share.

The Playmobil figures can bend, sit, stand, and turn their heads to make realistic role-play possible.

  • Produced in the EU: Germany, Malta, Spain, Czech Republic
  • Made of ABS plastic
  • Uses the standards ISO 14001 Environmental Management and ISO 50001 Energy Management in production.

Playmobil is seriously working on a more climate-friendly production
Playmobil is seriously working to minimize environmental impacts and, in particular, commits itself to responsible management of the resources needed for the production process. Playmobil's employees are trained in relation to environmental impact and responsible use of energy in relation to their work. Playmobil includes their suppliers and subcontractors in their environmental management concept, so they also handle the necessary resources carefully and exploit the potential for savings and recycling.

title: Dr. Hauschka - Eye Definer - Plum
category: Beauty - Makeup - Eyes - Eyeliners
description:
Super lovely eyeliner that is created to give your eyes a unique and defined look.

With this fantastic eyeliner from Dr. Hauschka it is possible to create different looks using the small applicator at one end. The eyeliner has a super mild formula, which is based on mineral pigments and extracts of medicinal plants, such as quince wax and shea, which will care for the eye area. The eyeliner from Dr. Hauschka gives a soft and supple result, slides easily over your eyelid and is easy to work with.

Application:

  • Apply all the way at the lash line above or below the eye depending on what look you want

  • For smokey-eye effect, you can advantageously use the small applicator at the other end to blend the line

Advantage:

  • Super lovely eyeliner with a small applicator from Dr. Hauschka

  • Gives a unique and defined expression

  • Allows you to create different looks

  • Based on mineral pigments and medicinal plants

title: BABY Born - Soft Touch Unicorn Sister 43cm (829349)
category: Toys - Dolls and Dollhouses - Dolls & Accessories - Dolls
description:
Unicorns are something special – just like sisters. Unicorn Sister is BABY born’s enchanting little sister. She looks just like a little elf in her dress with tulle skirt in rainbow colours and glittery top. Her long blond hair can be put into wonderful styles using the brush, two spiral elastics and four clips. The hairband with flower pins decorates the hairstyles. The girl with the Soft Touch body has flexible knees and can stand on her own as she waits for the unicorn in the magical forest. Her bottle with its glittery lid is always with her. After drinking, she might even cry a little if the mysterious unicorn doesn’t appear.

  • BABY born Sister
  • With six lifelike functions for even greater fun.
  • Varied (role) play with BABY born boosts the imagination and has been proven to support the development of social skills and values such as responsibility, communication and empathy.
  • No batteries required.

BABY born Soft Touch Fantasy Sister 43cm with dress, hairband and wings. Including bottle, hairbrush, 2 spiral elastics, 4 hair clips and 1 friendship bracelet each for the child and doll.

Purse Pets are fantastic interactive bags with the cutest animal motifs!

Here is a wildly cool and fluffy shoulder bag for children, which serves as the perfect accessory. Any child who loves animals and fashion would no doubt love a Purse Pets bag.

A Purse Pets bag has as many as 30 fun and entertaining sounds as well as features. There is plenty of space in the bag, and your child can carry the most important things with him everywhere.

The eyes, on the front of the bag, blink when the forehead is eaten. The bag can even play different melodies and play click sounds from a camera. That way, your child can feel like a true Hollywood star.

title: ​Skip Hop - Explore&More Activity Center
category: Toys - Baby and Toddler Toys - Learning & Activity Toys - Other Activity Toys
description:
Skip Hop modern activity center captivates the baby from head-to-toe from four months to toddler! Designed in collaboration with pediatricians, the baby activity center supports a whole body approach to play and learning. Easy to assemble, with toys that can be positioned anywhere for the baby. It features a 360-degree rotating seat that turns and stretches for bouncing. Our unique Discovery Window lets the baby see their feet while they play to learn cause and effect. As baby grows, our activity center converts for easy cruising - ultimately becoming a clean, sturdy table for coloring, playing and more. A modern, clean aesthetic and multiple uses will make this activity center a family favorite! 

Details:

  • From 4 months of age
  • Three stages of use: Sit, swivel and bounce & play Cruise and interact Play table
  • Phtalate free
  • Size L x W x H (cm): 79 x 79 x 47 
  • Discovery window lets the baby see the piano and their feet while playing
  • Clip-on toys can be positioned based on baby’s abilities
  • Converts to a play table with a smooth, seamless surface
  • 360-degree rotating seat that stretches for bouncing and includes toy loops to attach toys
  • Musical, light-up piano with three ways to play: piano mode, song mode and motion sensor mode
  • Peek-a-boo owl pops out and hoots
  • Spring cloud with colorful beads
  • Swaying trees move back and forth
  • Hedgehog bead chaser with spinner
  • Includes suction bee snack bowl dishwasher-safe
  • Foot support platform adjusts to the perfect height
  • Legs detach for easy storage
  • Clean with dry cloth only

Skip Hop

Based in New York City, Skip Hop is available world-wide for parents who appreciate better products that help improve their busy lives.

Skip Hop products meet or exceed all applicable standards for product safety in the markets we sell to. This includes physical/mechanical standards, as well as recent legislation regarding chemicals and minerals such as BPA, lead and Phthalates. All parties involved in the manufacture of Skip Hop products are required to follow these guidelines, and all tests are conducted by registered independent testing facilities.

A portion of all Skip Hop profits go to charities benefiting parents and children. In particular, we contribute to three organizations that we're honored to be able to help support. Whenever you purchase Skip Hop products, you are also helping to support the work of these great organizations.

title: WORMS RUMBLE (XONE/XSERIESX)
category: Video Games and Consoles - Xbox One - Games
description:
Welcome to Worms Rumble, the first ever Worms game to feature real-time combat! Dive into epic 32-player Battle Royale and Deathmatch modes with full multi-platform cross-play as you fight to be the last worm standing!

Worms Rumble will be fully-supported by ongoing content updates including new arenas, customisations, game modes and more&hellip

WORMS GOES REAL-TIME
Every round is in REAL TIME. When enemies rain down fire, unleash wormageddon right back! 

UP TO 32 PLAYER, CROSS-PLATFORM MULTIPLAYER
Play across PlayStation generations and PC, with Deathmatch and Last Worm Standing solo and squad Battle Royale modes available at launch!

CLASSIC WEAPONS, NEW WAYS TO PLAY
Arm Worms with new and returning fan-favourite weapons, including the Bazooka, Holy Hand Grenade, Hand Cannon and Baseball Bat!

EVENTS, CHALLENGES AND ‘THE LAB
Take part in seasonal events, daily and community challenges, and experiment with new gameplay mechanics and weapons in ‘The Lab’!

PLAYER CUSTOMISATIONS
Earn EXP and in-game currency to unlock and purchase weapon skins, outfits, accessories and emotes. Create your own personal style for the battlefield!

title: Overcooked + Overcooked 2 Double Pack
category: Video Games and Consoles - Xbox One - Games
description:
Working as a team, you and your fellow chefs must prepare, cook and serve up a variety of tasty orders before the baying customers storm out in a huff. Sharpen your knives and dust off your chef's whites, there isn't mushroom for error and the steaks are high in these crazy kitchens!

On the Nintendo Switch&trade, you can now experience the crazy couch co-operative action of Overcooked wherever you choose. Simply remove the Nintendo Switch console from the Nintendo Switch Dock&trade to take your culinary adventures on the road, just like our plucky chefs travelling around the Onion Kingdom!

The Onion Kingdom is in danger and only the finest cooking can save it! In Overcooked players must journey through a variety of cruel and unusual kitchens on their quest to become master chefs capable of conquering an ancient edible evil which plagues the land.

Overcooked Special Edition features all the exhilarating (and enraging) kitchens from the main game, as well as both expansions, 'The Lost Morsel' and 'Festive Seasoning'.


Overcooked returns with a brand-new helping of chaotic cooking action! Journey back to the Onion Kingdom and assemble your team of chefs in classic couch co-op or online play for up to four players. Hold onto your aprons &hellip it’s time to save the world (again!)

Out of the frying pan, into the fire&hellip

You’ve saved the world from the Ever Peckish. Now a new threat has arisen and it’s time to get back in the kitchen to stave off the hunger of The Unbread!

category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 4 - Accessories - Controllers
description:
Get the edge with the fully-customisable, REVOLUTION PRO CONTROLLER for PS4&trade, combining eSports features and controls to enhance and adapt to every style of competitive play.

Take your gaming performance to the next level, elevate your skill and maximise your potential with the technologically advanced controller, built for PS4&trade and tested by true eSports players.Customise your set-up for total control in every game, and take on the toughest opponents with stunning accuracy and precision.

title: YOUNGBLOOD - Mineral Primer 30 ml
category: Beauty - Makeup - Face - Primers
description:
YOUNGBLOOD's Mineral Primer is a delicious transparent primer, that smoothes fine lines and pores effectively. It gives an even surface, that makes the makeup apply flawlessly. The primer adds moisture to the skin and leaves it with a natural and silky look. It is a silicone based primer and absorbes immediately. When it is dry, it has a even and powdery finish. YOUNGBLOOD's Mineral Primer is enriched with there signatur mineral mix, that gives new energy to your skin. It contains A- and E- vitamins and natural antioxidants, that has a strengthen and building effect.

Application:

  • Use after your day creme and before your makeup
  • Apply with your fingertips or a foundation brush

Benefits:

  • Smoothes fine lines and pores effectively
  • Gives the perfect canvas for your makeup
  • Silicone based
  • Absorbs immediately
  • Moistures and strengthen your skin

YOUNGBLOOD
YOUNGBLOOD is a leading and award winning brand within mineral makeup. The brand is founded by Pauline Youngblood, because she wanted to create makeup that is natural and covering, without feeling like a mask.

YOUNGBLOOD Mineral Makeup is 100% pure and natural minerals, which are manufactured in a special process, that secures that the makeup lays weightless, perfect and with a flexible covering on your skin. YOUNGBLOOD fits all ages and melts flawlessly in all skins - even on sensitive skin.

Mineral Makeup let your skin breathe all day and feels natural on the skin. With the flexible covering you can choose between light, medium or full coverage. The YOUNGBLOOD products are light and easy to apply, all while it is long-lasting. Even in warmth, damp air, cold , if you trains or is on the office, your skin will look perfect and flawless.

All YOUNGBLOOD's products is free from talc, parabens, perfumes, chemical dyes and other ingredients that can irritate your skin. All most every product has SPF 10-15 and UV protection.

Besides makeup the brand produces special designed makeup brushes, that works perfectly together with the makeup products and secures that your makeup lays perfectly and flawless on your skin. The brushes are made of different brush hairs, that secures that you get the perfect application and blending with every single product. The wooden handles are all FSC certified.

title: The Legend Of Zelda: Breath Of The Wild
category: Video Games and Consoles - Nintendo Switch - Games
description:
Forget everything you know about The Legend of Zelda games. Step into a world of discovery, exploration and adventure in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, a boundary-breaking new game in the acclaimed series. Travel across fields, through forests and to mountain peaks as you discover what has become of the ruined kingdom of Hyrule in this stunning open-air adventure.

Climb up towers and mountain peaks in search of new destinations, then set your own path to get there and plunge into the wilderness. Along the way, you'll battle towering enemies, hunt wild beasts and gather ingredients for the food and elixirs you'll need to sustain you on your journey.

Shrines dot the landscape, waiting to be discovered in any order you want. Search for them in various ways, and solve a variety of puzzles inside. Work your way through the traps and devices inside to earn special items and other rewards that will help you on your adventure.

With an entire world waiting to be explored, you'll need a variety of outfits and gear to reach every corner. You may need to bundle up with warmer clothes or change into something better suited to the desert heat. Some clothing even has special effects that, for example, can make you faster and stealthier.

title: Naruto Shippuden Ultimate Ninja Storm 4 (Playstation Hits)
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 4 - Games
description:
THE STORY OF NARUTO SHIPPUDEN IS COMING TO THE NEW GENERATION!

With more than 12 million NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja® STORM games sold worldwide, this series has established itself among the pinnacle of Anime & Manga adaptations to videogames! As every good story comes to an end, NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 4 is going to be the most incredible STORM game released to date! For the fi rst time ever, the world of NARUTO will take advantage of the graphics power of the new generation systems.

  • New Generation Systems - With development made specifi cally to leverage the power of PlayStation®4, Xbox One and STEAM®, this brand new game will take players through an incredible journey of beautifully Anime-rendered fights!
  • Incredible Roster - The most impressive selection in the history of Naruto games will span the NARUTO SHIPPUDEN story arc and capture the latest character appearances from the manga.

title: LEGO Super Heroes - Batcave - The Riddler Face-off (76183)
category: Toys - Building and Construction Toys - Building Sets
description:
Fans of The Batman movie aged 8+ can impress their super-hero friends with LEGO® DC Batman™ Batcave™: The Riddler™ Face-off (76183).

Batman’s action-packed HQ
The Batcave is equipped with computers, tools and welding gear for vehicle repairs. The 2 side walls, one with a large GOTHAM CITY™ map and the other with a tool rack, are hinged so they can be rotated into different positions for more play space. The set features 6 minifigures from The Batman movie: Batman, Selina Kyle™, The Riddler, The Drifter, Alfred and Commissioner Gordon. 3 elements containing coded messages from The Riddler can be read only when kids use the special magnifying glass to reveal the clues. When Batman ventures out on his motorcycle, he can disguise himself as his alter ego, The Drifter. And, if he returns with any villains, the Batcave even has its own jail. The playset also allows the Batmobile™ from Batmobile: The Penguin™ Chase (76181, not included) to be driven onto the ramps ready for repairs.

  • Amazing Batman™ HQ – Any Batman fan will be captivated by the feature-packed LEGO® DC Batman Batcave™: The Riddler™ Face-off (76183)

  • 6 minifigures – As well as a host of features and accessories, this versatile playset includes Batman™, Selina Kyle™, The Riddler™, The Drifter, Alfred and Commissioner Gordon minifigures

  • Authentic accessories – An extensive assortment of accessories, including computers, tools, welding gear and a city map, inspire endless imaginative role play

  • Ideal for ages 8 and up – This buildable Batcave™ playset makes a great birthday or holiday gift for kids who enjoy Batman™ and imaginative super-hero adventures

  • Epic play and display – The playset measures over 7.5 in. (20 cm) high, 12.5 in. (32 cm) wide and 10 in. (25 cm) deep and combines easily with other LEGO® DC Batman™ sets

  • Combine sets for extra play – The Batcave™ also allows the Batmobile™ from LEGO® Batman™ Batmobile: The Penguin™ Chase (76181, not included) to be driven onto the ramps ready for repairs

  • More creative fun – All LEGO® DC building toys provide young super heroes with premium-quality playsets designed to deliver endless imaginative play possibilities

  • Quality guaranteed – LEGO® components fulfill stringent industry quality standards to ensure they are consistent, compatible and connect and pull apart perfectly every time

  • Safety assured – LEGO® components are dropped, heated, crushed, twisted and analyzed to make sure they satisfy rigorous global safety standards

With this Ripper trick scooter from Streetsurfing you get a really delicious quality scooter, which is suitable for both beginners and experienced users.
Streetsurfings Ripper model, guarantees you a high quality, at a very favorable price. The scooter is produced with Abec 7 ball bearings and rebound wheels with aluminum core, ensuring a good and stable driving experience.

The scooter has the following specs:

- Aluminum box deck in 6061 lightweight aluminum

- Height from ground to handle / bar is 83 cm

- Standard Threaded Headset

- 100mm Wheel Wheel with alu core

- Abec 7 bearings

- Tripple aluminum clamp

- Steel Bar

- Fender brake

- Age: 8 years

title: Murad - Retinol Youth Renewal Eye Serum 15 ml
category: Beauty - Skin care - Eyes - Serums
description:
Retinol Youth Renewal Eye Serum from Murad's Resurgence series is an effective solution for all the primary signs of skin aging in the eye area.

This serum smoothes out clear signs of aging in the eye area as it is equipped with Retionel Tri-Active Technology. The technology reduces, with its effective formula, the visibility of wrinkles and smile wrinkles using the nutritious marine plant complex that lifts and smoothes the skin. Furthermore, it is an advantage for you who suffer from dark circles, as it also manages to lighten these. This product is great for the woman who wants a fresh and awake face where the eyes play a big role. Already after a week of use, you will experience fresher and more youthful eyes.

Application:

  • Cleanse the skin thoroughly

  • Gentle dab on around the eyes and on the brow bone

  • Avoid contact with eyes

Advantage:

  • Wonderful eye serum from Murad

  • Effective solution

  • Smoothes out clear signs of aging

  • Effective formula

  • Reduces the visibility of wrinkles and lines

  • Lifts and smoothes

  • Lightens dark circles

  • Gives a fresh face

title: Montblanc - Legend EDT 50 ml
category: Beauty - Perfume - Eau de Toilette
description:
Montblanc Legend Eau de Toilette for Men reflects the contemporary elegance of the Montblanc brand, both modern and timeless. The fragrance starts with the fresh aromatic duo of Italian Bergamot and French Lavender. The heart note is magnetic, revealing a unique woody note and White cedar. The dry-down owes its unforgettable signature to an overdose of virile Oak moss. 

Notes:

  • Lavender, Bergamot, Lemon Verbena, Pineapple, Tonka Beans, Oak Moss, Geranium, Rose, Red Apple, Dried Fruits and Sandalwood

category: Beauty - Perfume - Eau de Toilette

title: Sleeping Dogs: Definitive Edition
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 4 - Games
description:
The Definitive Edition of the critically acclaimed, award winning open-world action adventure, reworked, rebuilt and re-mastered for the new generation. All 24 previously available DLC extensions have been integrated into the game, including the story-extending episode Year of the Snake and the horror-themed Nightmare in North Point. Alongside a wealth of new technological, audio and visual improvements, Hong Kong has never felt so alive.

A vibrant, neon city teaming with life, Hong Kong's exotic locations and busy streets and markets hide one of the most powerful and dangerous criminal organizations in the world: the notorious Triads. Play as Wei Shen - the highly skilled undercover cop trying to take down the Triads from the inside out. You'll have to prove yourself worthy as you fight your way up the organization, taking part in brutal criminal activities without blowing your cover.

Destroy your opponents in brutal hand-to-hand combat using an unmatched martial arts system. Dominate Hong Kong's buzzing streets in thrilling illegal street races and tear it up in explosive firearms action. Sleeping Dogs' Hong Kong is the ultimate playground.

Undercover, the rules are different.

  • A wealth of visual improvements means that Hong Kong has never felt so alive
  • Includes all 24 previously available DLC packs
  • Explosive action fuelled by a mix of deadly martial arts, intense gunfights and brutal takedowns
  • A vast array of exotic cars, superbikes and speedboats
  • Enter illegal street races or kick back with some karaoke

title: Murad - Age-Balancing Moisture SPF30 50 ml
category: Beauty - Skin care - Face - Creams & Moisturizers - Day Creams
description:
Age-Balancing Moisture from Murad's Resurgence series, specially developed for a skin affected by hormonal aging. The cream gives the skin a youthful glow and gives a lot of delicious moisture. It contains, among other things, avocado oil and bass butter that restores the skin's texture, suppleness and color. In addition, it has clover flower extract and soybean sterols that increase skin elasticity, which helps smooth out fine lines and wrinkles. Murad Age-Balancing Moisture keeps the skin's moisture level balanced, while protecting the skin's natural barrier.

Application:

  • Use on clean skin
  • Apply face and neck in the morning

Benefits:

  • Delicious day cream from Murad
  • Gives a youthful glow
  • Adds a lot of moisture
  • Restores skin structure and suppleness
  • Increases skin elasticity
  • Smoothes fine lines and wrinkles
  • Keeps the moisture level in balance

title: The Smurfs : Mission Vileaf - Smurftastic Edition
category: Video Games and Consoles - Nintendo Switch - Games
description:
In a dusty grimoire, the wizard Gargamel just put his hands on the formula of an evil plant: the VILEAF.

This plant produces “VILETRAP” seeds, which can attract and imprison Smurfs&hellip but these VILETRAP plants are also a great danger for the forest, as they are TOXIC, especially for the sarsaparilla fields!

PAPA SMURF decides to ask some of his fellow Smurfs to help him find the ingredients for a super powerful antidote for all the plants sick from the VILEAF.

Thanks to the SMURFIZER, an invention from HANDY SMURF, go on an adventure to find the ingredients and free your fellow Smurfs&hellip and save the whole village!

  • Embody 4 iconic Smurfs: the Smurfette, Hefty Smurf, Brainy Smurf and Chef Smurf in 5 different worlds
  • Use the Smurfizer to heal the Vileaf contaminated plants on your way to Gargamel’s hovel
  • The Smurfizer will also make you jump, glide, dive, vacuum&hellip keep a good timing to overcome every obstacle and beat your enemies
  • A subtle mix of platforming and exploration gameplays: find your way through vertical levels and explore them to uncover every secrets
  • Give life back to the Smurfs village by making progress and improve the Smurfizer by finding items spread around the levels
  • A game for every Smurfs fan, young or old, but also for every 3D platforming game fan!

title: Sol de Janeiro - Coco Cabana Cream 240 ml
category: Beauty - Bath and body - Moisturizers - Creams
description:
Is your skin dry and dehydrated? With this super moisturizing cream, your skin gets the boost of moisture it needs!

Coco Cabana Cream provides plenty of moisture for the treatment and transformation of even the driest, most dehydrated skin, leaving it super soft. The cream is based on body-loving oils as well as CocoSugar Blend, which provides up to 72 hours of hydration, so the benefits are both lovely and long-lasting. The cream smells fantastic of Cheirosa '39, which has notes of green coconuts, tropical orchid and toasted praline. Pamper your skin in the Brazilian way and achieve the softest and most irresistible skin.

Application:

  • Apply generously to the body

  • The more often you use, the deeper the benefits and the longer lasting hydration

Advantage:

  • Wonderful body cream from Sol de Janeiro

  • Super moisturizing

  • For dry and dehydrated skin

  • Leaves skin super soft

  • Provides up to 72 hours of hydration

  • Scent notes of green coconuts, tropical orchid and roasted praline
