title: DIAMOND DOTZ - Green Megapack DOTZIES 6 pieces
category: Toys - Arts and Crafts - Children's Craft Kits - Bead & Jewellery
description:
DIAMOND DOTZ - Diamond Painting - 12.793 Dotz - 40x30 cm. With this Original DIAMOND DOTZ package you will make unique creations through diamond painting! Using Diamond-like facets and a pre-printed pattern on canvas, you stick the stones on the included canvas to create a beautiful painting. This is the original diamond painting product consisting of only high quality products.It's quick and relaxing to do and the end result is so spectacular that you'll be eager to create more original Diamond Dotz artwork! These Diamond Painting Kits from the original brand DIAMOND DOTZ come with:

High quality printed canvas Pre-sorted colored stones in separate bags A working pen Pot of wax Clear instructions in English A color chart Spectacular results. The beautiful brilliance of each facet and the superior quality of the canvas make for a finished project like no other. What makes DIAMOND DOTZ so special? The Design Each DIAMOND DOTZ design is carefully interpreted by one of the designers. All the designs are either proprietary or licensed for use around the world. All images used on the packaging show the finished dot design and not an image of the artwork. That means you know exactly what the end result will look like before you start. The DIAMOND DOTZ Facets. Facets are made to exacting specifications. Premium/luxury 2.8mm epoxy resin diamond facet made from first class raw materials. The unique facet design has 13 different surfaces that reflect light and create a more spectacular finished result. The Facet is unique and reflects light much more than competing products. We also use many feature/highlight facets that give the end result a completely different look. The Work Base, The working base is a heavy, high quality, 100% woven polyester fabric that is designed to resist fold marks and is strong enough to support the weight of the facets without any problem. Even with the largest designs. Great for finishing and framing. Competitive products use a poor quality vinyl or synthetic multilayer substrate that has a poorer appearance and performance. The Adhesive Our adhesive is a patented, high-tech formula designed by industry experts specifically for diamond painting. The facets do not fall off the canvas and our adhesive makes dotting easy. Competitive products have problems with the adhesive and poorly designed substrates. This is especially the case with larger designs. The adhesive then cannot make a strong enough bond with the substrate and so the beads fall off over time. This is not the case with the diamond painting articles from DIAMOND DOTZ. The printing We use a patented, high-tech printing technology that ensures the products are beautifully printed. The printing is permanent, resistant to damage (scratches) and does not fade. All of this is done using non-toxic, environmentally friendly inks. Competitive product prints are not permanent, not water resistant, fade in sunlight and scratch very quickly. Quality and safety guarantee DIAMOND DOTZ takes quality and safety very highly and pay close attention to toxicity compliance obligations. Only first class materials that have passed rigorous testing in production are used, so you can be sure of what you are purchasing. Every component of DIAMOND DOTZ's Diamond Painting kits has been tested and independently certified in accordance with US and EU regulations. This means that the kits are made only from the highest quality materials and are safe for use. How does Diamond Painting work? The DIAMOND DOTZ pattern is printed with a special adhesive and covered with a protective film. Find the symbol on the pattern and find the corresponding symbol and color number on the Dotz list. Then find the correct bag of DIAMOND DOTZ and put it in the tray provided. Dip the working pen into the wax, then pick up the DIAMOND DOTZ from the tray with the working pen and stick the DIAMOND DOTZ on the correct symbol. Cover the pattern with the protective film when not working on it.

description:
Learn the alphabet with Ryder and Paw Patrol. This interactive tablet is the perfect way to introduce the little ones to letters.

This interactive first tablet encourages the child to learn whilst having fun with Ryder and the Pups. Ryder lights up and asks the child to find a letter or an object or to identify the first letter of a particular word. title: Codenames boardgame (Danish)
category: Toys - Games - Strategy Games
description:
Two rival spymasters know the secret identities of 25 agents. Their teammates know the agents only by their CODENAMES. In Codenames, two teams compete to see who can make contact with all of their agents first. Spymasters give one-word clues that can point to multiple words on the board. Their teammates try to guess words of the right color while avoiding those that belong to the opposing team. And everyone wants to avoid the assassin. Codenames: Win or lose, it's fun to figure out the clues.

Games is in Danish.

Game includes:

16 agent cards in two colours, 1 double agent card, 7 innocent bystander cards, 1 assassin card, 40 key cards, 1 rulebook, 1 card stand, 1 timer, 200 cards with 400 codenames

title: Under Night In-Birth Exe:[clr] (Code in a Box)
category: Video Games and Consoles - Nintendo Switch - Games
description:
The latest installment in the popular 2D anime fighting game Under Night In-Birth, will have you grabbing your fight sticks because this game is about to change it all up with numerous additions and enhancements. Under Night In-Birth Exe:Late[cl-r] will also feature a new character, Londrekia, and his frosty new set of moves!

In Under Night In-Birth, a mysterious phenomenon, known only as “the Hollow Night,” has enveloped regions of Japan in darkness for several centuries. Every area affected by the Hollow Night is beset by shadowy monsters&mdashknown as “Voids”&mdashwho feed off of a power called “Existence.” Most humans don’t possess the ability to see or come in contact with Voids, and therefore remain safe. You, however, are not so lucky. As one of a cast of unique characters, players fight their way through the dangers of the Hollow Night and defeat those who would try to get in your way. The game features classic 2D anime fighter controls with a splash of devastating combos and unique fighting styles sure to keep your appetite for battle sated. A fight is more than just pressing buttons!

Thanks to the simple design without visible screw and tricky corners and crannies, they are easy to operate, clean and fill up with soap and lotion or disinfectant handgel.   • Material: Stainless steel, Plastic, Rubber

  • Two sizes to distinguish between soap and lotion dispensers

Eva Solo - 100 years of Danish design

Eva Solo designer Danish home accessories and cookware in a beautiful and exclusive design that combines aesthetics , functionality and high quality . They design tools that is a pleasure to look at, use and own.

The history of the company dates as far back as 1913, but the Eva brand had its major breakthrough in 1952 with a bread and meat slicing machine that went on to become a design classic. The first of many. Today, the products are divided into several collections which are marketed worldwide. But the essence is still the same: aesthetics, functionality and quality.

title: Beyerdynamic - DT 1990 Pro Studio Headphones (Open)
category: Electronics - Audio & HiFi - Headphones & Headsets - Over Ear
description:
Tesla studio reference headphones for mixing and mastering

The DT 1990 PRO is an open studio headphone for mixing and mastering. The open design results in a very spatial, dynamic and natural sound with an original reproduction.
The efficient Tesla drivers ensure a perfect sound with an excellent resolution and high output level. The DT 1990 PRO features a modern design with a discrete elegance of ll components such as end pieces, yokes, ear cups and headbands. All components are replaceable and ensure a long lifetime of the headphone. The comfortable, replaceable ear pads and the adjustable headband with replaceable pad ensure superior comfort for a long period of time and an absolutely safe fit. The single-sided cable is detachable and lockable. The supplied hard case ensures safe transport or storage.

Features

  • Open premium studio headphones with Tesla drivers
  • Rugged headband made of spring steel
  • Single-sided, detachable cable
  • Soft, replaceable ear and headband pads
  • EDT 1990 A a pair of earpads for a neutral sound
  • (included in the delivery)
  • EDT 1990 B a pair of earpads for

Specifications

  • Transducer type: Dynamic
  • Operating principle: Open
  • Frequency response: 5 - 40,000 Hz
  • Nominal impedance: 250 Ω
  • Nominal SPL: 102 dB SPL (1 mW / 500 Hz)
  • Max. SPL: 125 dB SPL (200 mW / 500 Hz)
  • T.H.D: < 0.05% (1 mW / 500 Hz)
  • Nominal handling capacity: 200 mW
  • Sound coupling to the ear: Circumaural
  • Nominal headband pressure: approx. 6.6 N
  • Weight (without cable): 370 g
  • Length and type of cable: 3 m / straight cable or 5 m / coiled cable (stretched) each detachable with a 3-pin mini XLR cable connector, single-sided
  • Connection:
    • Gold-plated mini stereo jack (3.5 mm)
    • 1/4 adapter (6.35 mm)

title: Far Cry 3 - Classic Edition
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 4 - Games
description:
In Far Cry 3 you find yourself in the skin of Jason Broday, a man standing alone on the edge of the world on a mysterious Tropical Island cut off from civilization. In this brutal paradise, where crime and violence pose only certainty, you will decide when and how the events of the game will evolve.

Beyond the civilization lies and Island where no laws apply. It is the place where piracy and human poverty dominate, and where it is only through druds or bullets in the head. And that's where you are. You have stood there where no good is distinguished from evil, in a place that is guided by the principles of violence.

Beautiful and raw tray from Muubs. The tray is made of riverstone and is a unique product, since it is handmade from natural materials. Valley trays vary in colour, size and shape, since it is nature materials. It has a polished surface, but raw and unpolished edges. Stone tray has many use possibilities, it can be used as a steak plate, for serving tapas or as a decoration tray with salt and oil or candles and decorations.

  • Material: Riverstone

title: GoPro - Chesty
category: Electronics - Video and Photo - Action Cameras & Accessories - Action Cameras Accessories
description:
Amazing hands-free POV footage
The padded, flexible Chesty makes it easy to capture immersive hands-free shots from your chest. Made from breathable, lightweight materials, it can easily be adjusted to comfortably fit a wide range of body types. It’s perfect for biking, hiking, skiing or any adventure where you want amazing POV footage.
Product Details

Lightweight, flexible construction balances comfort and performance
Padded and breathable materials stay comfortable during any activity
Fully adjustable to fit a wide range of body types and over heavy winter jackets
Specially designed quick-release buckle lets you get in and out easily&mdasheven with gloves on
Stable platform for capturing incredibly immersive hands-free footage with GoPro cameras and Karma Grip

title: Dennis Knudsen PRIVATE - Rich Caviar Moisturizing Conditioner 500 ml
category: Beauty - Hair care - Conditioners - Conditioners
description:
A versatile and beautiful conditioner from Denmark's celebrity hairdresser number 1, which will do a favor for your hair

Dennis Knudsen PRIVATE - Rich Caviar Moisturizing Conditioner is suitable for all hair types, but is especially for dry or colored hair, as the conditioner adds lots of moisture and shine to the hair. The ingredients are chosen so that the shampoo gives the best possible volume, moisture and shine. Caviar extract has been added, which is full of natural amino acids and proteins, which adds intense moisture and nourishment to both the hair and the scalp.

Application

  • Apply to wet hair

  • Let it work for a few minutes

  • Then rinse your hair thoroughly

Advantage

  • Fantastic conditioner from Dennis Knudsen

  • Suitable for all hair types (especially good for dry or colored hair)

  • Provides volume, fullness and vitality

  • Adds moisture and shine

  • With caviar extract, amino acid and proteins

  • Nourishes the scalp

title: GOSH - Rose Oil Shampoo 450 ml
category: Beauty - Hair care - Shampoos - Shampoos
description:
Rose Oil Shampoo from GOSH is a shampoo for all hair types.

The shampoo effectively cleanses the hair of product residues and dirt, while at the same time moisturizing the hair. With the content of rose oil, the shampoo is especially gentle on an irritated scalp, where it also minimizes an overproduction of oil.

Application:

  • Apply the shampoo on wet hair

  • Massage it thoroughly into the scalp

  • Rinse hair with plenty of water

Advantage:

  • Shampoo from GOSH

  • For all hair types

  • Cleanses dirt

  • Moisturizes

  • Soothes an irritated scalp

title: One Flew Over The Cuckoo's Nest - Blu ray
category: Movies and TV Shows - Movies
description: Da den løsslupne småforbryder Randle P. McMurphy (Jack Nicholson) ankommer til et sindssygehospital, vender hans smittende sans for kaos op og ned på alle rutiner. McMurphy bliver den ene part i en psykologisk krig. Den elskværdige, men iskolde sygeplejerske Ratched (Louise Fletcher) bliver den anden, og efterhånden sættes alle patienternes skæbne på spil.

title: Monopoly + Monopoly Madness
category: Video Games and Consoles - Nintendo Switch - Games
description:
Would you like to become the new Mr.Monopoly? It’s your lucky day! OurfavouriteReal-Estate Mogulis going on a well-earned vacation andhe’s looking for a temporary stand-in.Hismethod of selection?A race forfame and fortune!This time the rules havechanged slightly: engage in afranticreal-timecompetitive raceto see whohas what it takes to take Mr. Monopoly’s place!

MONOPOLYMadness brings theMONOPOLYexperience intothearenafor the first time ever.Rediscover the propertytradinggame you love in a way you’ve never seen before.Roam the chaoticstreets of MonopolyCity, collect resources, buy and upgrade properties, mess with your opponents,and avoid their tricks to win therace for riches.This ismadness!

A NEW WAY TO PLAY

  • Play as one of the 20 new playable characters inspired by the classic MONOPOLY tokens.
  • No more board! Roam the streets of Monopoly and compete with other players to collect money, water, and electricity. Use these resources to acquire and upgrade properties – the more you have, the closer you’ll be to proving you have what it takes to run Monopoly City!
  • Get power-ups from Community Chests! Use them to mess with your opponents and gain an advantage to win.
  • Play the story mode or bring the challenge online with up to six players. You can even join forces in Teams mode and compete to be the wealthiest!

GET READY FOR FRANTIC ACTION

  • Ride a bulldozer, go through buildings, destroy properties with a jackhammer – all tactics to become the wealthiest of them all.
  • Customise the rules and play the way you want. One thing’s for sure, it’s gonna be madness no matter what!
  • Don’t be surprised if you get hit by a rolling pumpkin or by mad birds. Random events will infiltrate your games and make your journey even more chaotic. You might even end up in jail, so watch out!
  • Blow the resources you’ve collected on properties to buy or upgrade them.

CHAOTIC, FUN ENVIRONMENTS

  • Discover four unique environments inspired by the MONOPOLY game board with their own ambiance and architecture, including the iconic City and its Night Life, Beach Town, and Cozy Falls.
  • Each environment comes with several levels and layouts giving you 20 arenas to play.

title: NYX Professional Makeup - Thick It. Stick It! Brow Mascara - Espresso
category: Beauty - Makeup - Eyes - Eyebrow colors
description: New vegan * eyebrow mascara from NYX Professional Makeup: Thick It. Stick it! Available in several high-performance shades for color and fullness for all brow types. Gives a natural finish that lasts for up to 16 hours. Ultra-buildable, colored fibers of botanical origin that take your eyebrows to the next level with each additional layer. Upgrade your brows go from powerful, to more powerful and to most powerful! Brow mascara which by cube one application instantly styles and gives fullness. Precise application, does not smudge and is easy to use. Natural shades and hair-like fibers for a next level brow look. Formula that does not settle in flakes, does not smudge and does not spread. Just apply and you are ready for the whole day! New all-in-one eyebrow mascara to color, tame and give fullness. Brought to you by NYX Professional Makeup, eyebrow masters. * No ingredients or by-products of animal origin

title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them (Blu-Ray)
category: Movies and TV Shows - Movies
genre: A, d, v, e, n, t, u, r, e, ,,  , C, h, i, l, d, r, e, n,  , &,  , F, a, m, i, l, y
description: The movie 'Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them' is a fantasy movie from 2016 instructed by David Yates. The movie is based on the universe from the Harry-potter movies, but it is supposed to represent the time before the Harry-Potter movies, exactly 70 years before Harry Potter came to Hogwarts. The movie is about Newt Scamnder who arrives to New York to find and rescue magical creatures. A group of non-magic people wants to destroy all magic in the city, after a mysterious figure has begun to ravage the villagers. In the meantime, Europe has been left in ruins by the evil Gellert Grindelwald, who has disappeared. Several magical creatures get away and the situation heats up.

title: Tactic - Kubb in wodden box (56388)
category: Toys - Outdoor Toys - Lawn Games
description:
Kubb is a popular outdoor game in which the object is to knock over wooden skittles by throwing sticks at them. Knock over the skittles and the King, but be careful – if you knock over the King before all the other skittles are down, your opponent wins.

Contents: 1 king skittle, 10 Kubb skittles, 6 throwing sticks, 4 field marking stakes and rules.

title: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham
category: Video Games and Consoles - Nintendo 3DS - Games
description:
The best-selling LEGO Batman videogame franchise returns in an out-of-this-world, action-packed adventure! In LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham, the Caped Crusader joins forces with the super heroes of the DC Comics universe and blasts off to outer space to stop the evil Brainiac from destroying Earth. Using the power of the Lantern Rings, Brainiac shrinks worlds to add to his twisted collection of miniature cities from across the universe. Now the greatest super heroes and the most cunning villains must unite and journey to different Lantern Worlds to collect the Lantern Rings and stop Brainiac before it's too late.

  • Exciting space combat - For the first time ever, battle with Batman and his allies in outer space and the various Lantern worlds including Zamaron and Odym.
  • Robust roster of DC Comics heroes and villains - Play and unlock more than 150 unique characters with amazing powers and abilities, including members of the Justice League, and BIG LEGO Figures such as Cyborg, Solomon Grundy and more.
  • Unique storyline with new plots and twists -Surprising disguises, Brainiac's mind control ability, and the power of the Lantern rings bring a whole new twist to characters you thought you knew.
  • Hack computer terminals - Enter a virtual world to escape mazes, battle in arenas, and race to find the code.
  • Bat-tastic Gadget Wheel - With a simple press of a button, choose and upgrade select character's suits and abilities.
  • Variety of iconic locales - Visit the Hall of Justice, the Batcave, and the Justice League Watchtower to access shops, trophy rooms, and the hero and vehicle customizers.

title: Oddworld: Stranger's Wrath
category: Video Games and Consoles - Nintendo Switch - Games
description:
In the dusty, undeveloped wastelands of Western Mudos, cantankerous townsfolk find their settlements besieged by belligerent outlaws.
Along comes Stranger, a tall, dark and enigmatic bounty hunter with a mission to capture troublemakers and scoundrels and return them to civilized townships for incarceration.

But Stranger is keeping a secret and needs expensive surgery to survive. In his quest to earn enough Moolah, Stranger reluctantly accepts the ultimate bounty from the owner of the Mongo River and suddenly his adventure takes a very different turn.

title: Monster Jam - 1:24 Collector Truck S2 - Grave Digger
category: Toys - Cars, trains and vehicles - Play Vehicles - Cars
description: Ramp up your Monster Jam game with the all-new, official Monster Jam 1:24 scale monster truck! Featuring more details and graphics than ever before, this authentic replica embodies the style and swagger of the real thing! Official BKT rubber tires provide greater traction so you can take your truck to new heights! Plus, an all-new, working suspension system absorbs more impact, so the high-flying, car-crashing, truck-trashing jumps never stop! And with more trucks to collect than ever before, hosting your very own Monster Jam event is easy! Take your Monster Jam monster truck to the max! Collect them all!

title: DJI - Mini SE Fly More Combo Drone
category: Electronics - Drones - Drones
description:
DJI Mini SE Fly More Combo Drone

Weighing under 249 grams, DJI Mini SE is almost as light as the average smartphone. This makes it exceptionally portable and places it in the lowest and safest weight class of drones, which may exempt it from certain regulations in many countries.

Easy to Use
Get Good Fast
The DJI Fly app offers a simple and intuitive user experience, enabling you to create cinematic shots with just a few taps. It also includes Flight Tutorial, a feature to help you get started with DJI Mini SE quickly and safely.

Safe Flying
Worry Less, Fly More
DJI Mini SE comes equipped with a 360° Propeller Guard that fully protects the propellers and improves flight safety. Thanks to advanced sensors, DJI Mini SE can also hover precisely.

Easy-To-Use Templates
Let the App Do the Work
The DJI Fly app offers a variety of Creator Templates that generate awesome videos with just a tap. Even beginners with no editing experience can turn any moment into a social media hit.
Open Your Sky
The compact-yet-powerful DJI Mini SE is the perfect creative companion, capturing your moments in a way that effortlessly elevates the ordinary. Together with the easy-to-use DJI Fly app, you’ll enjoy a simplified flying experience and a perspective unlike any other.
Smaller, Lighter, Better
“DJI Mini SE lets me capture some of our most cherished family moments from an amazing, new perspective.

Stabilized Gimbal Camera
Transform Any Moment<br>Into a Work of Art
DJI Mini SE supports 12MP aerial photos and 2.7K Quad HD videos. A 3-axis motorized gimbal provides superior camera stability and ensures clear, ultra-smooth footage.

Remote Controller
Less Charging,More Flying

Features
Complex Shots Are Easier Than Ever
Shots that look like they came from a Hollywood film set are just a few taps away with DJI Mini SE’s QuickShot modes, which include Dronie, Circle, Helix, and Rocket. Just select your QuickShot, and DJI Mini SE will execute an elaborate preset motion while recording. Take the automatically generated short video and share it instantly with friends on social media.
249 g Ultra lig
30-Min Max.Flight Time
4km HD Video Transmission 
Vision Sensor + GPS Precise Hover
3-Axis Gimbal 2.7K Camera

EAN: 6941565911452 / CP.MA.00000320.01

title: Philips - NeoPix Ultra 2+ - Projector
category: Electronics - Televisions & Video - Projectors
description:
The NeoPix Ultra 2+ is capable of producing a bright and colorful image of 65” wide in True Full HD 1080p in a
dark room. With the Android TV dongle, your favorite content is always front and center. So whether you’re
looking for a new show on Netflix, Hulu or Disney+ to binge watch or just want to pick up where you left off,
you get what you want, when you want it. Just ask the Google Assistant! Chromecast built-in lets you cast your
favorite entertainment and apps from your phone, tablet or laptop right to your projector! Just connect the
dongle via HDMI and USB and voila! The second HDMI port lets you connect your gaming console or any other
device like a laptop, smartphone or a DVD player. Want a bigger sound? Connect your dongle directly to
Bluetooth speakers or earphones!
The stereo speakers will provide a super sound for a total cinematic immersion.

Specifications

NeoPix Ultra 2+
Light Engine
Display technology: LCD
Light source: LED
LED light sources: last over 30.000 hours
Contrast ratio: 3000:1
Resolution: 1920 x 1080 pixel
Resolution supported: 1920 x 1080 pixel
Throw ratio: 1.4:1
Screen size (diagonal): 20” to 65”
Screen distance: 80 cm to 200 cm / 24-60
Aspect ratio: 16:9
Image Settings

Focus adjustment: manual
Digital zoom (60-100%): yes
Keystone adjustment: manual
Connection

Google Cast, Google Assistant

earphones, remote, gamepad, mouse or keyboard

Sound
Internal Speaker: 2x5 Watt
Surround mode
Equalization
External Dongle
Android TV&trade / Full catalog of Apps
OS: AndroidTV
CPU: AMT972 QuadCore.
Integrated Media Player
Thousand of codecs supported via VLC built-in
players

220x170x90mm / 8.6x6.6x3.5 inch
Packed (W x D x H): 267 x 216 x 148mm
Weights: 1.2kg / 2.69lbs

title: Lyngby Porcelaen - Vase - H38 Clear (201095)
category: Home and Kitchen - Decor - Vases
description:
The characteristic Lyngby vase in clear glass has become a true design classic. With its simple and minimalist expression, it is perfect for filling with sumptuous, colorful flowers and branches. As a still life, this glass vase also looks beautiful on, for example, the dining table or coffee table.

  • Mouth blown glass

  • Iconic design

  • Available in several sizes and colors

About the Lyngby vase

The Lyngby vase is today one of the most iconic products from Porcelænsfabrikken Danmark - Lyngby Porcelæn. The cylindrical white vase was designed based on the 1930s ideology of uniting form and function. Superfluous ornamentation should no longer be part of the design - the vase should stand in its pure form and be usable. Let Lyngbyvasen with the iconic grooves have a place in your home.

title: SwimFin - Light Pink
category: Toys - Outdoor Toys - Beach Toys - Flotation Devices & Accessories
description:
SwimFin is fun a water toy and flotation device all in one. SwimFin inspires imagination and play. When a child puts on a SwimFin, they immediately become more active, playing, building confidence, learning, experimenting and having FUN! SwimFin plays a psychological part in learning to swim, even before a lesson has started. Kids love the feeling of safety and security SwimFin gives them, while it motivates and encourages imagination and play.

How to wear Swimfin

  • SwimFin should be worn high on the back, above the centre of gravity. This way it will suspend the child in the water.
  • SwimFin will not tip a child forward if worn correctly, as can be seen in the photos.
  • SwimFin should never be used with a baby that cannot control their body yet.
  • SwimFin must NEVER be worn on the front of the body.
  • To be used under constant, capable supervision.

SwimFin has been tried and tested and is proven to work for all ages, sizes and abilities. However, the packaging there is a chart saying SwimFin is suitable for children 15-30 kgs and gives an approximate age range of 3 – 6 years.

This is how SwimFin works:

The more submerged SwimFin is, the more support it is giving. Remember, the more visible it is, the less it's working.This means when the child is vertical, doggy paddling through the water, SwimFin will be almost completely submerged, giving maximum support. As the child's body position becomes more horizontal, SwimFin comes out of the water giving less support. This means the child is swimming more for themselves with less and less assistance. And Swimfin never has to be inflated, deflated, or need to have additional support added or removed as with armbands/discs, body vests etc.

title: Let's Sing 2022
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 5 - Games
description: Are you ready to take on the perfect mix of 30 new chart breakers and all-time classics and rock the stage? Sing alone or grab your friends for a battle of the voices in both online and offline game modes to determine - once and for all - who is the best singer around. Experience the Let's Party mode with up to eight singers or climb to the top of the worldwide online leaderboards.

title: Monster Jam - Spin Rippers - San-Uva Digger (20119281)
category: Toys - Cars, trains and vehicles - Play Vehicles - Cars
description:
Rip and watch ‘em go with the all-new Monster Jam Spin Rippers! Pull off awesome donuts like you’ve seen in the live shows with these 1:43 scale official Monster Jam trucks! Insert the included ripcord into the back, rip it out and watch it go! 

When you pull the cord out, your truck will unleash its power, spinning over and over. Put the cord back in and unleash your Spin Rippers’ power again and again – it’s so much fun!

title: Bakugan - Ultra Ball - Demorc (6059566)
category: Toys - Figures - Collectibles
description:
• Unleash the power of Bakugan Ultra and its amazing leap open Baku-Action transformation! Pick up BakuCores and reveal their hidden power. How do you roll?
  • Face off against your friends, roll into action and emerge victorious! For a surprise attack, summon a Geogan (sold separately) to empower your Bakugan Ultra and conquer your opponent!
  • With over 200 characters to collect in Season 3, add them all to your collection! Collect new and returning characters and all-new Geogan, with new shapes and unique pop open transformations!
  • Discover even more ways to play with the included Gate-Card! If your Bakugan opens and lands on a gate, flip the card over and discover a bonus to add to your Bakugan’s total power! For ages 6 and up.

title: Gemex - Hairclip model set (145-HUN0234)
category: Toys - Arts and Crafts - Children's Craft Kits - Bead & Jewellery
description:
Fantastic and entertaining hair clip set from Gemex!

If your kids love to be creative, then the above hair clip set is just the thing! Here your children get the opportunity to unfold their creative abilities, while at the same time creating their very own play and entertainment.

This set is super fun and kids can create their own hair clips that they can use themselves afterwards. A magic gel is included, but should you run out of gel, you can easily buy a refill.

The set is quite simple and easy to play with. There is a guide, but for the sake of goodness, we'll briefly explain it here too. All you have to do is put the mica in the mold in which the gel is to be applied. Finally, use the flashlight to illuminate the mold for 3 minutes, to solidify them. Next, they can be put on the buckles and are ready for use.

NOTE: The flashlight requires 3 x AAA batteries, which are not included.

Product info:

  • 1 magic flashlight

  • 1 x 25 grams of gel

  • 1 form

  • 1 stirring tool

  • 3 bags of mica in the colors blue, purple and silver

  • 4 hairpins

  • 2 sheets of stickers

  • Recommended age: From 5 years

title: Barbie  - Off-Road Vehicle (GMT46)
category: Toys - Dolls and Dollhouses - Fashion Dolls & Accessories - Vehicles
description:
Young imaginations can hit the open road with this adventure-ready Barbie® vehicle! With rolling wheels and a cool, open-air look, kids can buckle Barbie® doll and a friend in and take them anywhere their stories lead (dolls sold separately). Just give it a push to get the fun rolling with four silvery wheels and treaded tires. This colorful off-road vehicle is just Barbie® doll's style with a purple body, pink interior and light-blue trim. Featuring fun accents, like Barbie® logo details and a personalized license plate, it's ready for any adventure. Let imaginations explore the road ahead because with Barbie®, you can be anything! Collect other Barbie® dolls and accessories to pack the car full of fun (each sold separately, subject to availability). Dolls not included. Colors and decorations may vary.

  • Young imaginations can take their stories off the beaten path with this all-terrain Barbie® vehicle!
  • With a cool, open-air look, this Barbie® vehicle lets imaginations take Barbie® doll and a friend (dolls sold separately) on a casual cruise, an off-road adventure or anywhere their imaginations take them!
  • Features a purple body, pink interior, silvery accents (like the grille and wheels) and tires that roll -- push to start the fun!
  • Barbie® logo details and a personalized license plate add signature style.
  • Adventurers 3 to 7 years old will love hitting the open road and veering off it to make their own path because with Barbie®, you can be anything! Collect other Barbie® dolls and accessories to pack the car full of fun (each sold separately, subject to availability).

title: NYX Professional Makeup - Filler Instinct Plumping Lip Polish - Brunch Drunk
category: Beauty - Makeup - Lips - Lip glosses
description:
Filler Instinct Plumping Lip Polish from NYX Professional Makeup lets you highlight your pout, in the best possible way. It has a curved applicator that makes it easy to apply the luxurious lip color with a single stroke. It covers the lips with a beautiful glow and makes them look fuller, softer and more beautiful. Choose from six super-light colors - five with pearlescent color, plus a versatile clear gloss, they minimizes the appearance of fine lines and does not bleed. Try your favorite color alone or over a lipstick to highlight your look. Note that the lipgloss will sting a little at first.This is normal and is for achieving the plumping effect.

Application:

  • Apply to the lips
  • Can be used alone or over lipstick

Benefits:

  • Delicious lip gloss from NYX Professional Makeup
  • Plumping effect
  • Curved applicator
  • Easy to apply
  • Gives a beautiful glow
  • Makes your lips look full, soft and beautiful
  • Minimizes the appearance of fine lines
  • Does not bleed

NYX Professional Makeup

NYX Professional Makeup is known for high quality and professional makeup at affordable prices

NYX Professional Makeup is a leading brand in Color Cosmetics and is also known for their color and pigment rich products. The brand includes several series and collections of classic, seasonal and on-trend cosmetics. NYX Professional Makeup is a must-have for professional makeup artists and anyone else who loves beauty and cosmetics. The mission of the brand is to open up play, exploration and creativity with makeup - and then it must be possible to find exactly the color you want.

title: Smallstuff - Little Backpack w. Leather Star - Powder Gold
category: Luggage and Travel Gear - Backpacks - Kids' Backpacks
description:

title: Den Røde Tråd - DVD
category: Movies and TV Shows - Movies
description: Ved den tyske besættelses ophør skjuler Oberst Heinecken det tyske rigsguld på frk. Jensens Pensionat i Sommerby. 44 år senere ankommer Heineckens søn for at lede efter guldet, men det samme gør de tre sønner af tre amerikanske sergenter, der boede på pensionatet ved krigens ophør. Vilde og groteske situationer opstår.

title: Harry Potter - Blind Box (33160030)
category: Toys - Figures - Collectibles
description: A selection of 10 collectible figures from the magical world of Harry Potter, in exciting gold-colored blind boxes. The characters include Harry, Ron and Hermione, but also Ginny, Cho, Cedric, Luna, Malfoy and Snape. Each box also contains accessories for the guide, such as pets, spells that appear in water, hidden passwords, characters, books, brooms, and other enchanted items. The surprises are hidden in environmentally smart paper bags. 3+

title: Super Mario Odyssey
category: Video Games and Consoles - Nintendo Switch - Games
description:
New Evolution of Mario Sandbox-Style Gameplay.

Mario embarks on a new journey through unknown worlds, running and jumping through huge 3D worlds in the first sandbox-style Mario game since Super Mario 64 and Super Mario Sunshine. Set sail between expansive worlds aboard an airship, and perform all-new actions, such as throwing Mario's cap.

title: Disney Classic Games Collection: The Jungle Book, Aladdin, & The Lion King
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 4 - Games
description:
Disney Classic Games Collection is the latest and greatest compilation of classic Disney games based on some of the most beloved Disney movies of all time: Aladdin,.  
The Lion King, and now, The Jungle Book!  Now you can play ALL of the critically acclaimed 16-Bit console versions of “Aladdin”, along with classic games based on Disney’s “The Jungle Book”!  
These all-new, fan requested, and beloved games complete this collection, making this the only way to experience all 16-bit console versions of Aladdin and The Jungle Book
Play as some of your favorite Disney characters, including Aladdin, Simba, and Mowgli, all while experiencing some of the best graphics the 16-Bit era had to offer. 
Play through multiple versions of each included game and enjoy tons of new features, enhancements, game modes, easy game saves, and display options.

title: PAW Patrol: On a Roll
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 4 - Games
description:
PAW Patrol is on a roll!No job is too big, no pup is too small! The PAW Patrol is ready to save the day in Adventure Bay on 16 exciting rescue missions, but they can only do it with your help! Help each pup use their unique abilities to rescue friends and keep their community safe. Jump into eight awesome Adventure Bay locations, including Farmer Yumi’s Farm, Jake’s Mountain, a desert canyon, under the waves, and more! Get ready for fun puzzle-platforming action that is PAWfect for kids of all ages with all the pups of the PAW Patrol!

  • Ryder and all eight PAW Patrol pups, including Everest & Tracker!
  • 16 daring adventures set in 8 Adventure Bay locations!
  • Special pup abilities that need to be used for each rescue!
  • Playing as two different pups per mission!

title: Uncharted: The Nathan Drake Collection (Playstation Hits)
category: Video Games and Consoles - PlayStation 4 - Games
description:
Unparalleled Story – Play as Nathan Drake across a trilogy of thrilling, white-knuckle adventures. Experience Drake's relationships with those closest to him, as he struggles to balance adventure and family.

New Trophies – Brand-new trophies created exclusively for UNCHARTED's debut on the PS4 system.

Photo Mode – Freeze gameplay at any time and take control of the camera to capture your most memorable moments from the trilogy to share with friends directly from your PS4 system. Utilize graphical filters, camera controls, and other options to customize your shot.

title: Team Sonic Racing - 30th Anniversary Edition
category: Video Games and Consoles - Nintendo Switch - Games
description:
Team Sonic Racing combines the best elements of arcade and fast-paced competitive style racing as you face-off with friends in intense multiplayer racing. Race together and work together as a team by sharing power-ups and speed boosts. Take control of your racing style - Choose from 3 distinct character types and unlock game changing vehicle customisation options to suit your racing style. Speed up. Gear Up – Team Racing at Sonic Speed!

Key Features
Online Multiplayer & Local Co-Op Modes – 12 players per race, 4 player split screen, and various offline / online race modes including Grand Prix Mode, Exhibition Mode, Time-Trial and Team Adventure Mode.

  • Team Racing – Race as a team, win as a team. Use various team moves to assist your teammates, knock out opponents and unleash your Team Ultimate.
  • Performance & Skin Customisation – Alter the appearance and handling of your vehicle (9 unique parts for every character, 135 parts total)
  • Wisps - 14 spectacular offensive and defensive items to help overcome rival teams and get ahead!
  • Adventure Mode – Unique story experience where players are introduced to basic game features and characters.
  • Various Characters and Classes –  15 playable characters from across the Sonic Universe and 3 distinct character types including Speed, Technique, and Power classes.

title: Salcura - Bioskin DermaSerum 50 ml
category: Beauty - Skin care - Face - Oils & Serums
description:
Mild and light facial serum that you can use on a daily basis to make a big difference to yourself and your skin's health!

The above quality serum from Salcura ensures you an effectively hydrated and nourished skin, which is extremely important if you suffer from dry and scaly skin on a daily basis.

The serum contains many different natural oil extracts, which are packed with vitamins that your skin is hungry for. The serum contains i.a. saffron oil, which makes your skin smooth and soft and reduces the dryness of the skin, while the grape seed oil with Omega 3 and 6 provides your skin with important nutrients.

In addition, the serum also contains a lot of antioxidants, which are packed with vitamins C, D and E, which have an anti-inflammatory effect on your skin, just as the extracts from the eucalyptus plant are also antibacterial.

You can use Bioskin Dermaserum on a daily basis, as it fills your skin with moisture, which is crucial for healthy skin. You can also apply the serum around the eyes. Bioskin Dermaserum is also suitable for people who may be prone to atopic eczema, psoriasis and rosacea.

Bioskim Dermaserum has been dermatologically tested.

Application:

  • For dry and sensitive skin, apply Bioskin Dermaserum 3-4 times daily on affected areas, by gently dipping the serum into the skin - avoid unnecessary friction. When symptoms show signs of relief, Dermaserum is applied twice daily as part of the usual skin care routine.

  • For normal to slightly dry skin, Bioskim Dermaserum is used as part of the daily skin care routine.

Benefits:

  • Ensures you hydrated and nourished skin

  • Important serum if you suffer from dry and scaly skin

  • The serum contains many different natural oil extracts

  • Contains saffron oil, which makes your skin smooth and soft and reduces dryness in the skin

  • Contains grape seed oil with Omega 3 and 6, which provides your skin with important nutrients

  • Also contains a lot of antioxidants, which are packed with vitamin C, D and E.

  • Has an anti-inflammatory effect on your skin

  • You can use Bioskin Dermaserum on a daily basis

  • You can also apply the serum around the eyes

  • Bioskin Dermaserum is also suitable for people who may be prone to atopic eczema, psoriasis and rosacea.

  • Bioskim Dermaserum has been dermatologically tested.

title: Gillette - Venus Breeze Blades 4 Pack
category: Health and Personal Care - Personal Care - Shaving and hair removal - Manual Shaving - Womens - Razor Blades
description:
Gillette - Venus Breeze Blades

Venus Breeze gives you a delicious care to your skin while it makes sure that you get a smooth and close shave. It has 3 blades, that is surrounded by to moisture bars, that makes shaving gel unnecessary. Besides moisture the moisture bars gives you a great fragrance of flower oils.
To activate the moisture bars all you have to do is moisture it with water, before your shaving. Venus Breeze gives you a feeling of freshness and is quick and easy to use. The blades follow the conturs of the body flexible and secures that you get a close shave.

Is ideal for travel

Application:

  • Can be used for the entire body
  • Used for a smooth and close shaving
  • Moisture the blades before using, to activate the moisture bars

Benefits:

  • Gives a close and smooth shaving
  • Has moisture bars, that makes shaving gel unnecessary
  • Gives a feeling of freshness
  • Is quick and easy to use
  • Is ideal for travel

Gillette - We'll stop making razorblades, when we can't make them better

Gillette is one of the most well-known brands all over the world, when we talk about shaving. King C. Gilette founded the Gillette Company back in 1901. Since then it was owned by Gillette Global and since 2007, Gilette is owned by Procter & Gamble.

Gillette got there first patent on razors in 1903 and was until 1921, where the patent expired, the only ones on the market, which gave them a huge lead to their competitors. Gillette has always wanted the Gillette razors to be available to everyone, no matter which economy class they come from.

Gillette is always working innovative and is always making themselves better and better. That's why it isn't odd, that one of their known quotes is: We'll stop making razorblades, when we can't make them better.

Gillette's giant selection of products contains, among other things, shavinggel, shavingcream, razorblades, razors and disposable razors. So here you will get all you need for an optimal and sharp shaving.

Gillette offers quality products to men and women. For women Gillette Venus and Satin Care are the most popular and what you should aim for, if you want quality shaving and silky skin. For men there is Gillette Fusion, Gillette Mach3, Gillette Fusion Power, Gillette Fusion Proglide and last, but not least Gillette Fusion Proglide Power, which all offers a close shave to very good prices.

The MagSafe charger makes it easy to charge wirelessly.

title: Logitech - G PowerPlay Wireless Charging System
category: Computers - Accessories - Mouse Pads
description:
A REVOLUTION IN PC GAMING
Untethered, Uncompromised, Uninterrupted
With POWERPLAY&trade and LIGHTSPEED&trade technology, Logitech G has solved the barriers to high performance wireless gaming. Input lag, wireless disconnects, and dead batteries are now a thing of the past. Welcome to the future of wireless PC gaming, achieved through advanced science and unrivaled engineering.


POWERPLAY CHARGING TECHNOLOGY
Infinite Power
Through innovative application of electromagnetic resonance, the POWERPLAY base creates an energy field above its surface. This allows charging while in motion and delivers wireless power without interfering with the precise measurement and data transmission of a high-performance gaming mouse. Integrating the technology into a 2mm thin form factor was no simple task. Enter: Logitech G.


POWERCORE MODULE
Unlimited Play
The POWERPLAY energy field is transformed into charging current by the POWERCORE&trade module, which attaches magnetically to compatible wireless gaming mice. The beauty of POWERPLAY is that your mouse will charge while you’re at play and at rest. We’ve made it that simple. It just stays charged. So, group up fearlessly, grind ranks, raid to your heart’s content ... Repeat. Ad infinitum.


LIGHTSPEED WIRELESS TECHNOLOGY
True Freedom, Advanced Performance
Logitech G invented LIGHTSPEED wireless technology to deliver the ultimate in high-performance wireless gaming. LIGHTSPEED wireless technology is as fast or faster than many leading competitor’s wired gaming mice. So you get the freedom of wireless with no compromises.


CLOTH AND HARD GAMING MOUSE PAD
Choose Your Surface
Tune your performance to your mouse pad of choice. We include both our cloth and hard surfaces so you can customize and swap interchangeably. POWERPLAY will suit your style right out of the box.


POWERPLAY GAMING MICE
Just Add POWERCORE&trade
The included POWERCORE module enables compatible wireless mice for POWERPLAY. It works with the all-new G903 and G703 wireless gaming mice. Easily swap in the magnetic POWERCORE module and you’re ready to wirelessly charge.


CUSTOMIZABLE RGB LIGHTING
Sync Color with Your Gaming Gear
Your G lights up in Brilliant RGB color. Use Logitech Gaming Software and set your lighting to match the rest of your gear with approximately 16.8 million colors. You can even synchronize color and lighting effects with Logitech G gaming mice, keyboards, and headsets for a unified look and feel.

title: Rodial - Pink Diamond Magic Gel Night 50 ml

description:
The night gel is enriched with Retinol, which reduces fine lines and wrinkles while you sleep. The gel has a light formula and is moisturizing, as well as contains Diamond Powder and Retinol that promote skin renewal and repair overnight. At the same time, it gives you visibly smoother, more lifted and radiant skin. Its key ingredients are Peptides, Diamond Powder, Retinol and Vitamin C. Pink Diamond Magic Gel Night from Rodial is effective and reduces fine lines and wrinkles over the night. 

Application:

  • Apply only in the evening
  • Test on the skin before use
  • Do not apply to irritated skin
  • Avoid excessive sun exposure
  • Remember the SPF when using the product
  • Do not use this product during pregnancy

Benefits:

  • Delicious and effective night gel from Rodial
  • Enriched with Retinol
  • Reduces fine lines and wrinkles
  • Easy formula
  • Moisturizing
  • Promotes skin renewal and repair

Rodial

title: Dr. Hauschka - Volume Mascara - Plum
category: Beauty - Makeup - Eyes - Mascaras
description:
This Volume Mascara from Dr. Hauschka, is a mascara that gives you an intense look. The mascara makes the eyelashes full and gives a bulky look. It is formulated with mineral pigments and extracts of medicinal plants, especially of quince seeds, as well as silk and candelilla waxes. These pigments and extracts enclose each eyelash.

Application:

  • Lay the mascara with zigzag movements
  • Put the brush at the roots of the lashes
  • Then move it side by side to the tip of the lashes
  • Finally, pull the brush to the side

Benefits:

  • Volume Mascara from Dr. Hauschka
  • Make the lashes high on volume 
  • Gives a bulky look
  • Formulated with mineral pigments and extracts of medicinal plants
  • Each eyelash is wrapped in this mascara
  • 8 ml

Dr. Hauschka

Dr. Hauschka is an environmentally certified brand that produces environmentally friendly, organic and biodynamic skin products. Robert Hauschka was a young chemist who developed natural medical products through unique thinking and manufacturing methods.

Stud the rhythms ... the rhythm carries life. Dr. Hauschka developed, based on this sentence, a completely new and revolutionary method for improving his natural medical products. The rhythm is found in nature, in man and in the universe. Considering and following the various rhythms of production, Dr. Hauschka achieved very good results. He spent several years thinking about developing great skin care products.

This became a reality when he entered into cooperation with the Swedish cosmetologist, Elisabeth Sigmund. Among other things, the products were developed to follow the skin's rhythm and changeable condition. They were produced without chemical-synthetic emulsifiers and with beautiful fragrances from essential oils. In 1999, they were able to present their new complete makeup series that not only adorns but also carries the face.

The products are also being developed today as naturally as possible. Dr. Hauschka's philosophy is that when you take something, you also give something back - this applies in all contexts of life. WALA therefore cultivates many of their herbs and medicines themselves. This is done ecologically and biodynamically without chemical insects and pesticides.

Dr. Hauschka's products are not manufactured for a particular skin type, but to a given skin condition. The skin changes in a 28-day cycle. Therefore, it is important that, for example, face cream follows this rhythm. In addition, makeup from Dr. Also shed skin while wearing. Dr. Hauschka's products seduce the discerning buyer with the sensible experience of naturalness.

description:
This Volume Mascara from Dr. Hauschka, is a mascara that gives you an intense look. The mascara makes the eyelashes full and gives a bulky look. It is formulated with mineral pigments and extracts of medicinal plants, especially of quince seeds, as well as silk and candelilla waxes. These pigments and extracts enclose each eyelash.

Application:

  • Lay the mascara with zigzag movements
  • Put the brush at the roots of the lashes
  • Then move it side by side to the tip of the lashes
  • Finally, pull the brush to the side

Benefits:

  • Volume Mascara from Dr. Hauschka
  • Make the lashes high on volume 
  • Gives a bulky look
  • Formulated with mineral pigments and extracts of medicinal plants
  • Each eyelash is wrapped in this mascara
  • 8 ml

Dr. Hauschka

Dr. Hauschka is an environmentally certified brand that produces environmentally friendly, organic and biodynamic skin products. Robert Hauschka was a young chemist who developed natural medical products through unique thinking and manufacturing methods.

Stud the rhythms ... the rhythm carries life. Dr. Hauschka developed, based on this sentence, a completely new and revolutionary method for improving his natural medical products. The rhythm is found in nature, in man and in the universe. Considering and following the various rhythms of production, Dr. Hauschka achieved very good results. He spent several years thinking about developing great skin care products.

This became a reality when he entered into cooperation with the Swedish cosmetologist, Elisabeth Sigmund. Among other things, the products were developed to follow the skin's rhythm and changeable condition. They were produced without chemical-synthetic emulsifiers and with beautiful fragrances from essential oils. In 1999, they were able to present their new complete makeup series that not only adorns but also carries the face.

The products are also being developed today as naturally as possible. Dr. Hauschka's philosophy is that when you take something, you also give something back - this applies in all contexts of life. WALA therefore cultivates many of their herbs and medicines themselves. This is done ecologically and biodynamically without chemical insects and pesticides.

Dr. Hauschka's products are not manufactured for a particular skin type, but to a given skin condition. The skin changes in a 28-day cycle. Therefore, it is important that, for example, face cream follows this rhythm. In addition, makeup from Dr. Also shed skin while wearing. Dr. Hauschka's products seduce the discerning buyer with the sensible experience of naturalness.

title: Rodial - Retinol 10% Booster Drops
category: Beauty - Skin care - Face - Treatments & Masks - Bosters
description:
Booster Drops from Rodial is a series of serums formulated with one highly concentrated ingredient that boosts your skin care routine. 10% Retinol Complex is a rejuvenating concentrate that is designed to provide proven anti-age results. This powerful ingredient revitalizes the skin, increases cell renewal and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for a more youthful skin. Uneven skin tone and pigmentation are targeted, while the appearance of enlarged pores is visibly reduced for a more clear, radiant and rejuvenated skin.

Application:

  • After cleansing, 2-3 drops are massaged into the face and neck, with particular focus on areas with fine lines
  • Allow the product to dry completely
  • Use only in the evening two to three times a week
  • Use SPF protection while using the product
  • Do not use during pregnancy

Benefits:

  • Extremely effective serum from Rodial
  • Boosts your skin care routine
  • Rejuvenating concentrate
  • Proven anti-age effect
  • Increases cell renewal
  • Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
  • Gives a more youthful skin
  • Provides a more even skin tone and pigmentation
  • Reduces the appearance of enlarged pores visibly
  • Provides a more clear, brilliant and youthful skin

Rodial

Rodial was founded in 1999 by Maria Hatzistefanis who previously worked as an international journalist. After seeing a gap in the market in beauty and high provide capacity within skincare with targeted and result-oriented treatments focusing in special areas. Rodial is today a very famous and recognized brand globally. The company it is available in over 35 countries worldwide. Rodial constantly striving excellence, innovation and creativity in everything they do. Rodial Skin- and body care, is a fusion between science and natural skin care. Rodial Skin- and body care, is a fusion between science and natural skin care. The products are targeted for women who want to solve individual and specific imperfections.

title: Titan Quest (Collector's Edition)
category: Video Games and Consoles - Xbox One - Games
description:
From Age of Empires co-creator Brian Sullivan and Braveheart writer Randall Wallace comes an action role playing game set in ancient Greece, Egypt and Asia. The Titans have escaped their eternal prison, wreaking havoc upon the earth. The gods seek a hero who can turn the tide in an epic struggle that will determine the fate of both men and gods. Are you ready for the quest?

Features:

  • Explore the Ancient World – Unlock arcane mysteries as you journey to legendary locations
  • Conquer Monsters of Legend – Battle mythical beasts in a story-driven campaign that will determine the fate of all existence
  • Highly Customizable Characters – Build and customize your characters with 28 classes and over 1000 pieces of unique and legendary items to create the ultimate champion
  • Online Multiplayer Gameplay – Challenge others to experience the story in fast-action, 2–6 player online cooperative gameplay
  • Console controls & UI – Tailor made UI and controls for a perfect ARPG experience using a gamepad
  • Remastered graphics – Fully reworked textures for an up to date Titan Quest experience

title: Waytoplay - The Highway, 24 pc
category: Toys - Cars, trains and vehicles - Car lanes
description:
The waytoplay Highway is a great toy for imaginative play. Watch your children create their very own circuits and road maps for their favourite toys and vehicles.

  • Flexible, durable road toy, 376cm length
  • 12 curves, 8 straights, 2 intersections and 2 roundabouts.
  • Expand your road by purchasing  additional sets later
  • Can be used on almost any surface, inside or outside
  • Easy to connect parts
  • Encourages imaginative play
  • Great to combine with other toys

Waytoplay is more than a toy, it is a Dutch Design original. Each set features easy to connect road segments. Straights, curves, parking spaces, roundabouts, junctions and more. Made of high grade, child safe rubber, simply roll out an adventure anywhere and anytime. Indoors and out! The beach, deep pile carpet or that bumpy garden path, turn any place into your waytoplay. The open ended sets can be added to, for endless fun. Let your child find its way to play and become king of the road.

title: Cocomelon - Little Plush - JJ Duck (CMW0017_2)
category: Toys - Stuffed Animals & Plush Toys
description:
Your child can squeeze, squish, and cuddle up with the CoComelon Little Plush assortment! This adorable plush collection is inspired by the popular and educational YouTube series, CoComelon! This fun assortment includes JJ dressed as a kitty, a puppy or a duckie! The 20 cm CoComelon Little Plush assortment is highly-detailed and sure to become a favorite in your home! Bring all of the CoComelon fun home with the Little Plush assortment! 

 Includes:1 CoComelon Little Plush

Ages: Suitable for ages 18 months

title: Baby Dan - TPR Cup Holder
category: Baby and Children - Pushchairs, Prams & Accessories - Parts & Accessories - Parent Cup Holders
description:
Drinks should preferably be at hand - even when traveling with the cart

TPR Cup Holder from Baby Dan is a practical cup holder that can be used for both parents' coffee or the children's drinking bottle. It is designed so that the drinks are kept in place and are at hand. It is easy to mount and dismount and there are not many prams or strollers that it is not fit for.

title: Gear4U Powerbank - 20000mAh Li-pol
category: Electronics - Smartphones and Tablets - Accessories - Chargers - Portable Power Banks
description:
You will never again run out of power on the go

GEAR4U Powerbank is a powerbank with a large battery that is easy to bring along in your bag and always ensures power for all of your devices. Whether you forgot to charge your phone and are on your way out the door or your child's tablet runs out of power on a road trip, you will always have an extra battery on hand. With a smart battery level indicator in white LED light, you always have a clear overview of how much power is left in the power bank.

Includes

  • 1 x GEAR4U Powerbank.


Specifications

  • 20000 mAh li-polymer battery.

  • Battery level indicator in white LED light.

  • 2 x USB port for charging devices.

  • Supplied voltage: 5V / 1A and 5V / 2A.

  • Measurements: (W) 68 x (D) 135.5 x (H) 28.2 mm.

  • Weight: 399 g.

title: Razor - S Spark Scooter - Blue (13073048)
category: Toys - Riding Toys - Scooters
description:
Light up your ride, based on the best selling a scooter, with its top of the class quality construction, leave a spark wherever you go. Push down on the sparking bar and the light up wheels will ensure you will be seen wherever you go

  • Steel t-tube
  • Aluminium deck comfortably supports riders up to 100kg
  • Urethane light-up wheels
  • Spark Mechanism
  • Age: 8+
  • Max Rider Weight: 100 kg
  • Size: 63 x 28.7 x 82.6 cm
